outline:
Tanjur Peking Bruno Lainé
1 Q2001 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
1b1-5b3 bstod tshogs, ka 1b1-5b3 (vol.46, p.1) khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa bi shaSh+Ta stA pa viśeṣastava mtho btsun grub rje/(udbhaṭasiddhasvāmin) dpal brtsegs/(kūṭarakṣita) rin chen mchog(ratnottara) sarvajādeva dpal brtsegs khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa/_slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA de bA dang/_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/_slad kyi ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
2 Q2002 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
5b3-48a8 bstod tshogs, ka 5b3-48a8 (vol.46, p.4) khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa bi she shasta ba nA ma TI kA viśeṣastava-nāma-ṭīkā shes rab go cha/(prajāvarman) kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po/(ānandadhvajaśrībhadra) jārandana rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pa/_slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/_byang phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba/_b+haM ga la'i yul gyis slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dzA ran+da na dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_yid srubs zla ba'i gtsug dang gos gser can/_rig byed byed po dga' byed grog mkhar pa/_rgyas pa rgyal dpog pa dang sa yi bu/_thub pa rkang mig phur bu lha min rjes/_skyob pa nyid mor byed pa'i rgyud 'khrungs pa/_srid gsum bla ma shAkya'i rgyal po de'i/_rnam par thar la bskrun min der bstod pa/_de'i 'grel pa de 'dir rdzogs par byas/_dge ba de yis srid pa'i ljongs rgyu bas/_bdag tu 'dzin pa'i thibs par 'khyams gyur pa/_mu stegs byed kyi mun pa 'joms byed pa'i/_rgyal ba nyin mor byed par bdag gyur cig /_khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/_slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa las/_bar skabs su tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'grel pa'i rgya dpe ma rnyed nas/_dus phyis shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya ba/_dpal sa skya'i dgon par sbyar ba rdzogs so
3 Q2003 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
48a8-49a8 bstod tshogs, ka 48a8-49a8 (vol.46, p.21) thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa zhes bya ba sarba dz+nye ma hA sh+wa ra stotra na ma sarvajñāmaheśvarastotra-nāma mtho btsun grub rje/(udbhaṭasiddhasvāmin) jārandana rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) tham cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa bram ze'i dge bsnyen mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran+da na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
4 Q2004 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
49a8-51a4 bstod tshogs, ka 49a8-51a4 (vol.46, p.21) lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa de wA ti sh+ya sto tra devātiśayastotra bde byed bdag po/(śaṁkarapati) dpal brtsegs/(kūṭarakṣita) rin chen mchog(ratnottara) sarvajādeva lha las phul du byung ba'i bstod pa /_slob dpon bde byed bdag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ban+de dpal rtsegs rak+Sha tis gtan la phab pa'o
5 Q2005 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
51a5-70a4 bstod tshogs, ka 51a5-70a4 (vol.46, p.22) lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa de wA ti shA ya sto tra TI kA devātiśayastotraṭīkā shes rab go cha/(prajāvarman) jārandana rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/_slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran+da na'i zhal snga nas dang/_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
6 Q2006 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
70a4-71a2 bstod tshogs, ka 70a4-71a2 (vol.46, p.30) sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba bud d+ha s+ya sto tra nA ma buddhastotra-nāma nor rgyun ma/(vasudhārā) rgyal ba'i snyan bzang po/(jetakaraṇabhadra) nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po/(āryadhvajaśrībhadra) 'phags ma nor rgyun pas mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rdzogs so/ /rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra'i mkhan po dpal rgyal ba'i snyan bzang po dang / shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur pa'o
7 Q2007 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
71a2-72a2 bstod tshogs, ka 71a2-72a2 (vol.46, p.30)bstod tshogs, ka
71a2-72a2 chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa
dharmakāyāśrayāsāmānyaguṇastotra thogs med/(asaṅga) jinamitra ye shes sde/(jānasena) śīlendrabodhi chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/_slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
8 Q2008 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
72a2-72b8 bstod tshogs, ka 72a2-72b8 (vol.46, p.31) de kho na nyid la bstod pa ta t+wa sta ba tattvastava dpal gyi go cha/(śrīvarman) majuśrībhadra shAkya 'od/(śākyaprabhā) de kho na nyid la bstod pa//shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI b+ha dra dang /_dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
9 Q2009 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
72b8-73a6 bstod tshogs, ka 72b8-73a6 (vol.46, p.31) bdud btul ba la bstod pa
mārajitstotra rab dga'i lha/(pramuditādeva) bdud btul ba la bstod pa/ rab dga'i lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
10 Q2010 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
73a7-77b8 bstod tshogs, ka 73a7-77b8 (vol.46, p.31)bstod tshogs, ka
73a7-77b8 chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa d+harma d+hA tu sto tra dharmadhātustotra klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) kṛiṣṇapaṇḍita chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o
11 Q2011 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
77b8-79a5 bstod tshogs, ka 77b8-79a5 (vol.46, p.33)bstod tshogs, ka
77b8-79a5 dpe med par bstod pa ni rU pa ma sta pa nirupamastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Ta paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o
12 Q2012 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
79a5-80b2 bstod tshogs, ka 79a5-80b2 (vol.46, p.33)bstod tshogs, ka
79a5-80b2 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa lo kA tI ta sta ba lokātītastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) kṛiṣṇapaṇḍita 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Ta paN+Di ta dang /_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
13 Q2013 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
80b3-80b8 bstod tshogs, ka 80b3-80b8 (vol.46, p.34)bstod tshogs, ka
80b3-80b8 sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa tsit+ta badzra sta ba cittavajrastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) sems kyi rdo rde'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
14 Q2014 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
81a1-81b2 bstod tshogs, ka 81a1-81b2 (vol.46, p.34)bstod tshogs, ka
81a1-81b2 don dam par bstod pa pa ra ma thAr+tha sta ba paramārthastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) don dam par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
15 Q2015 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
81b2-82a3 bstod tshogs, ka 81b2-82a3 (vol.46, p.34)bstod tshogs, ka
81b2-82a3 sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba kA ya tri ya sto tra nA ma kāyatrayastotra-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) kṛiṣṇapaṇḍita sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / /lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
16 Q2016 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
82a4-86a8 bstod tshogs, ka 82a4-86a8 (vol.46, p.35)bstod tshogs, ka
82a4-86a8 sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma s+ya bi ba ra nA ma kāyatrayastotra-nāma-vivaraṇa klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) śraddhākaravarman slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+h+rA ka ra warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos gsar du bsgyur cing zhus pa lags so
17 Q2017 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
86a8-87b2 bstod tshogs, ka 86a8-87b2 (vol.46, p.36)bstod tshogs, ka
86a8-87b2 sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa sat+wA ra dA na sta ba sattvārādhanastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) dīpaṁkaraśrījāna tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
18 Q2018 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
87b2-88b3 bstod tshogs, ka 87b2-88b3 (vol.46, p.37)bstod tshogs, ka
87b2-88b3 shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod pa pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta sto taM prajñāpāramitāstotra klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) blo ldan shes rab/(dhīmatjāna) tshig le bum pa/(tilakalaśa) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
19 Q2019 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
88b3-91a4 bstod tshogs, ka 88b3-91a4 (vol.46, p.37)bstod tshogs, ka
88b3-91a4 bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa a tsin+ta sta ba acintyastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
20 Q2020 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
91a4-92a3 bstod tshogs, ka 91a4-92a3 (vol.46, p.38)bstod tshogs, ka
91a4-92a3 bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa ru ta sti sta ba stutyatītastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
21 Q2021 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
92a3-92b2 bstod tshogs, ka 92a3-92b2 (vol.46, p.39)bstod tshogs, ka
92a3-92b2 bla na med pa'i bstod pa ni rut+ta sta pa niruttarastava klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) bla na med pa'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
22 Q2022 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
92b2-93a3 bstod tshogs, ka 92b2-93a3 (vol.46, p.39)bstod tshogs, ka
92b2-93a3 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba Ar+ya b+ha T+TA ra ka many+dzu shrI pa ra mAr+tha stu ti nA ma ārya-bhaṭṭārakamañjuśrīparamārthastuti-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam par bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
23 Q2023 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
93a4-94a4 bstod tshogs, ka 93a4-94a4 (vol.46, p.39)bstod tshogs, ka
93a4-94a4 rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+ha T*TA ra ka kA ru Na sto tra ārya-mañjuśrībhaṭṭārakakaruṇāstotra klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
24 Q2024 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
94a5-94b7 bstod tshogs, ka 94a5-94b7 (vol.46, p.39)bstod tshogs, ka
94a5-94b7 gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa aSh+Ta ma hA s+tha na tsai ta sto tra aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotra klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/_slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
3957 Q2025 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
94b7-95b1 bstod tshogs, ka 94b7-95b1 (vol.46, p.40)bstod tshogs, ka
94b7-95b1 gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa aSh+Ta ma hA s+tha na tsai ta sto tra aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotra klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
26 Q2026 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
95b1-96a7 bstod tshogs, ka 95b1-96a7 (vol.46, p.40)bstod tshogs, ka
95b1-96a7 mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba d+wI da sha kA ra nA ma na ya sto traM dvādaśakāra-nāma-nayastotra klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
27 Q2027 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
96a8-96b8 bstod tshogs, ka 96a8-96b8 (vol.46, p.41)bstod tshogs, ka
96a8-96b8 phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa zhes bya ba ban da na sto tra nA ma vandanāstotra-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
28 Q2028 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
97a1-97b7 bstod tshogs, ka 97a1-97b7 (vol.46, p.41)bstod tshogs, ka
97a1-97b7 dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba na ra god+d+hi ra nA ma narakoddhāra-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) tilaka nyi ma grags dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o/_/'dis kyang 'gro ba du ma la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig_/dpal ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du grong khyer dpe med kyi paN+Di ta ti la ka dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
29 Q2029 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
97b7-118a2 bstod tshogs, ka 97b7-118a2 (vol.46, p.41) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba bar+Na ra ha bar Ne b+ha ga ba to/ bud d+ha sto tra ya shAkya sta ba nA ma varṇārhavarṇe bhagavato buddhasya stotre 'śakyastava-nāma maticitra dpal brtsegs/(kūṭarakṣita) padmākara rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) sarvajādeva sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma tri tsi Tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA na de ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
30 Q2030 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
118a2-118b1 bstod tshogs, ka 118a2-118b1 (vol.46, p.49) dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa tri rat+na maMM ga la sto tra triratnamaṅgalastotra maticitra dpal brtsegs/(kūṭarakṣita) vidyākarasiṁhaprabhā dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
31 Q2031 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
118b1-119a8 bstod tshogs, ka 118b1-119a8 (vol.46, p.49) yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa saM m+yak+sam+bud+d+ha ya ka ta sto traM samyaksaṁbuddhaketastotra maticitra yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/_snyan ngag mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so
32 Q2032 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
119b1-120a4 bstod tshogs, ka 119b1-120a4 (vol.46, p.50) gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa e kot+ta ri ka sto traM ekottarikastotra maticitra dharmaśrībhadra rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa//slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI bad+d+ra dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa
33 Q2033 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
120a4-122a3 bstod tshogs, ka 120a4-122a3 (vol.46, p.50) bde bar gshegs pa sum cu so lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa su ga ta pany+tsa tri rat+na nA ma ma la sto taM sugatapañcatriṁśatstotranāmaratnamālā-nāma maticitra rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) sumakaravarman bde bar gshegs pa sum cu tsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya garagyi mkhan po su ma ka ra war+m+ma dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
34 Q2034 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs
122a3-122b4 bstod tshogs, ka 122a3-122b4 (vol.46, p.51) tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'i bstod pa ba dar+b+h+ya a Sh+Ta ka sto traM padāṣṭakastotra mtha' yas lha/(anantadeva) tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so
35 Q2035 1KG13126bstod tshogs, ka11KG13170bstod tshogs

306a3-315b1 rgyud 'grel, nga 306a3-315b1 (vol.47, p.268) dus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba kA la tsakrA ba tA ra bA ma kālacakrāvatāra-nāma 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa/(abhayākāragupta) 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa/(abhayākaragupta) dharmakīrti dpal gyi mtha' can dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba shrAi d+harma kirtisa bsgyur ba'o/ slad kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i paN+Di ta chen po mkhas btsun grub pa brnyes pa rA hu la shrAi b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dgi slong dpal gyi mtha' can gyis dag par bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o
99 Q2099 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, nga51KG13174rgyud 'grel
315b1-316b8 rgyud 'grel, nga 315b1-316b8 (vol.47, p.272) dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya ba shrI kA la tsAkra ga No pa de sha nA ma śrī-kālacakragaṇanopadeśa-nāma śākyaśrībhadra dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+hasa mdzad pa rdzogs so
3958 Q2100 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, nga51KG13174rgyud 'grel
316b8-317b4 rgyud 'grel, nga 316b8-317b4 (vol.47, p.272) dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya ba
śrī-kālacakragaṇanopadeśa-nāma śākyaśrībhadra dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ rgya gar kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrAi b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so
101 Q2101 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, nga51KG13174rgyud 'grel
317b5-320b6 rgyud 'grel, nga 317b5-320b6 (vol.47, p.273) gza' lnga so so'i rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya ba pany+tsa gra hA pra ti ga No pa de sha na ma pañcagrahapratigaṇanopadeśa-nāma śākyaśrībhadra gza' lnga so so'i rkyang rtsis kyi mang ngag paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrAi b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so
102 Q2102 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, nga51KG13174rgyud 'grel
320b7-342a4 rgyud 'grel, nga 320b7-342a4 (vol.47, p.274) sbyor ba yan lag drug pa Sha DaM ga yo ga ṣaḍaṅgayoga dpe med pas bsrungs pa/(anupamarakṣita) mi mnyam bzang po/(atulyabhadra) blo gros brtan pa/(sthiramati) vibhūticandra dpal ldan mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs par rgyud sna tshogs pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor yan lag drug rdzogs so/ /'di ni mkhas pa dpe med pas gsungs pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/ /la stod deng ri'i bla 'khor mkhan pa khrod du/ rgya gar shar phyogs dza gad da la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hu ti tsan dang / gnyal gyi lo rtsA ba mi mnyam bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /slar yang lo tsA ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa snyams las pa bsod snyoms pa dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la lhag par mos shing blo gros kyi snang ba cher rgyas pa'i slob dpon chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul te/ sgra don ji lta ba bzhin du bsgyur zhing zhu chen grub pa'o
103 Q2103 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, nga51KG13174rgyud 'grel
342a5-371a8 rgyud 'grel, nga 342a5-371a8 (vol.47, p.283) rnal 'byor yan lag drug gi brjed byang yon tan gyis 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gu NA b+ha ri Ni nA ma Sha DaM ga yo ga Ti na guṇabharaṇī-nāma-ṣaḍaṅgayogaṭippaṇī nyi ma dpal ye shes/(raviśrījāna) blo gros brtan pa/(sthiramati) vibhūticandra mkhas pa chen po gnas brtan nyi ma dpal ye shes kyis mdzad pa rnal 'byor yan lag drug gi brjed byang yon tan gyi 'gengs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI bi b+hu ti tsan+d+rasa ru lag gi snying po 'bring mtshams kyi sa'i cha dpal rgya btags kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//'di'i gzhung gi tshad ni phyed dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag drug go /slar yang lo tsA ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa snyoms la sba dpang dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la mos shing blo'i snang ba cher rgyas pa'i slob dpon chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i bka' bskul te bsgyur cing zhus chen grub pa'o/ /paNa chen rnal 'byor zla ba'i rang 'gyur la//phyed tsam ma bsgyur 'ol phyir mdzad pa las//blo gros brtan pas sgra don ji bzhin bsgyur//dge des 'gro kun mkhyen myur thob shog /'dis 'gro ba shin tu mang po la phan par gyur cig /'di'i don gyi cha la the tshom za ba 'ga' zhig dang tshig phrad kyi brda ma dag pa mang du snang na'ang yid ches pa'i gnas kyi phyi mo na'ang de kho na ltar 'dug pas de bzhin du byas so//de ltar zhus dag gnyis pa'i tshogs grub pa'o
104 Q2104 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
1b1-24b4 rgyud 'grel, ca 1b1-24b4 (vol.48, p.1) dbang mdor bstan pa'i brjed byang se kod+de sha Tip+pa ni sekoddeśaṭippaṇī rnam par rgyal ba dbang po/(vijayendra) blo gros brtan pa/(sthiramati) dbang bskur mdor bstan pa'i brdzod byang 'di ni dpal dus kyi 'khor lo pa paN+Di ta rnam par rgyal ba dbang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/ gzhung gi tshad ni tshigs su bcad pa bdun cu tsa bdun lhag pa'i brgya phrag bzhi'o/ /lo tsA ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa dpang dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
105 Q2105 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
24b4-25a7 rgyud 'grel, ca 24b4-25a7 (vol.48, p.12) rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs
ārya-tārābhaṭṭārikāsādhana dpe med kyi bsrung pa/(anupamarakṣita) 'di'i dbu zhabs rnams ni slob dpon 'di nyid kyis mdzad pa'i mgon po spyan ras gazigasadabanga phyug mkha' la gshegs pa'i sgrub thabs dang 'dra se snang ngo
106 Q2106 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
25a7-28b1 rgyud 'grel, ca 25a7-28b1 (vol.48, p.12) rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba badzra ba da gar+b+ha saM gra ha nA ma vajrapadagarbhasaṁgraha-nāma kha che'i paN+Di ta chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta de nyid kyi drung du/ dpyal lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o
107 Q2107 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
28b1-30a7 rgyud 'grel, ca 28b1-30a7 (vol.48, p.13) rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel badzra pA da gagr+b+ha saM gra ha nA ma pany+dzi ka vajrapadagarbhasaṁgraha-nāma-pañjikā kha che paN chen/ dpyal kha che'i paN+Di ta chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta de nyid kyi drung du/ dpyal lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o
108 Q2108 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
30a7-36b2 rgyud 'grel, ca 30a7-36b2 (vol.48, p.14) dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba shrI kA la tsakra su pra tiSh+Tha pA yi ka bi d+hi śrī-kālacakrasupratiṣṭhopāyikāvidhi dus 'khor zhabs/(kālacakrapāda) chos rab/(dharmavara) vāgīśvara dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i lugs kyi rab tu gnas pa/ slob dpon dus kyi 'khor zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta wA gI shwa ra dang chos rab kyis bsgyur ro
109 Q2109 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
36b2-40a2 rgyud 'grel, ca 36b2-40a2 (vol.48, p.16) dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba shrI kA la tsakra ga Na tsakra pA yi kA bi d+hi śrī-kālacakragaṇacakropāvidhi dus 'khor zhabs/(kālacakrapāda) chos rab/(dharmavara) vāgīśvara 'di ni dpa' bo'i ston mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga'i rim pa'o/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa/ slob dpon dus 'khor zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta wA gI shwa ra dang chos rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
110 Q2110 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
40a4-44b8 rgyud 'grel, ca 40a4-44b8 (vol.48, p.18) dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba shrI kA la tsakra ho ma pa pA yi ka bi d+hi śrī-kālacakrahomopāyikāvidhi dus 'khor zhabs/(kālacakrapāda) chos rab/(dharmavara) vāgīśvara dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i lungs kyi sbyin sreg /slob dpon dus 'khor zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta wA gI shwa ra dang chos rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
111 Q2111 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
44b8-115b6 rgyud 'grel, ca 44b8-115b6 (vol.48, p.20) 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bdud rtsi'i thig pa zhes bya ba a mr-i ta ka NI kA nA mAr+ya nA ma saM gi ti Ti pya Ni amṛitakaṇikā-nāma-āryanāmasaṁgītiṭippaṇī nyi ma'i dpal ye shes/(raviśrījāna) chos rje'i dpal/(dharmasvāmiśrī) nor bu dpal ye shes/(maṇikaśrījāna) nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer/(ravīndraprabha) dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdor bshad bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan nyi ma'i dpal ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po nor bu dpal ye shes dang / bla ma rje btsun rdo rje 'chang chen po dpal nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas/ lo tsA ba chag dge slong chos rje'i dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
112 Q2112 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
115b6-146a4 rgyud 'grel, ca 115b6-146a4 (vol.48, p.48) 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI t+ya mri ta bin+du pra t+ya lo ka br-it+ti nA ma ārya-mañjuśrīnāmasaṁgīti-amṛtabindupratyālokavṛitti-nāma anupamarakṣita dharmakīrti sugataśrī rdo rje rgyal mtshan/(vajradhvaja) 'phag pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sgron ma gsal ba zhi ba mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs kyi rngul la reg pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a nu pa ma rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ dpal byang ri bkra shis kyi gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhas pa su ga ta shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba d+harma kir+ti dang dge slong rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
113 Q2113 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
146a4-214a7 rgyud 'grel, ca 146a4-214a7 (vol.48, p.60) 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnam par bshad pa Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti byA khyA naM ārya-mañjuśrīnāmasaṁgītivyākhyāna dbang po grags pa/(narendrakīrti) abhayavajra rdo rje rgyal po/(vajrarāja) 'phag pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa mi'i dbang po grags pas mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi bka' brgyud pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po a b+ha ya badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba sbal rdo rje rgyal pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
114 Q2114 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
214a8-265a1 rgyud 'grel, ca 214a8-265a1 (vol.48, p.87) 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gI ti/ TI kA bi ma la pra b+ha āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṁgītiṭīkāvimalaprabhā rgyal po pad+ma dkar po/(rāja puṇḍarīka) bsod snyoms pa chen po/(mahāpiṇḍapātika) 'phag pa 'jam dpal gyi Ti ka rgyal po pad+ma dkar pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rig pa'i 'byung nas yul ma ga d+ha'i dpal nA lan+dara rje btsun ma sgron ma'i lha khang du/ paN+Di ta chen po dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal bsod snyoms pa chen pos/ skyes bu rnams kyi don du bsgyur ba/ 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od rdzogs so
115 Q2115 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
265a1-321b8 rgyud 'grel, ca 265a1-321b8 (vol.48, p.108) 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i phan yon gyi 'grel pa Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gA ti s+yA nu saM sA br-it+ti ārya-mañjuśrīnāmasaṁgītisvānuśaṁsāvṛitti grags pa/(kīrti) sabhayavajra rdo rje rgyal po/(vajrarāja) 'phag pa 'jam dpal gyi phan yon gyi 'grel pa sngags kyi don snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ dpal mkhas pa chen po dus kyi 'khor lo pa grags pa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+Ya a b+ha ya badz+ra dang / dge bsnyen rdo rje rgyal pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
116 Q2116 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ca61KG13175rgyud 'grel
321b8-348b7 rgyud 'grel, ca 321b8-348b7 (vol.48, p.130) 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mngon par rtogs pa Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gI t+ya b+hi sa ma ya ārya-mañjuśrīnāmasaṁgītyabhisamaya spyan ras gzigs/(avalokita) 'phag pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mngon par rtog pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
117 Q2117 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, cha71KG13176rgyud 'grel
1b1-74a7 rgyud 'grel, cha 1b1-74a7 (vol.48, p.143) mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las phyung ba nyung ngu'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba lak+ShA b+hi d+ha nA dud+d+h+r-i to la g+hu tan+t+ra piN+DAr+tha bi wa ra NaM nA ma lakṣābhidhānāduddhṛitalaghutantrapiṇḍārthavivaraṇa-nāma ting nge 'dzin bzang po/(samādhibhadra) blo gros brtan pa/(stiramati) rab 'byor zhi ba/(subhūtiśānti) zhes pa mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las phyung ba nyung ngu'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba/ le'u dang po'i 'grel bshad rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba'i zhal snga nas/ cog gru lo tsA ba dge slong ting nge 'dzin bzang pos bsgyur ba las/ dus phyis/ thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa/ bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa/ legs par sbyar ba'i skang kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa shong lo tsA ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas/ brag dmar dben sar legs par bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o
118 Q2118 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, cha71KG13176rgyud 'grel
74a7-159a6 rgyud 'grel, cha 74a7-159a6 (vol.48, p.173) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba sA dh+a na ni da na shrI tsakra sam+ba ra nA ma pany+tsi kA sādhananidāna-nāma-śrīcakrasaṁvarapañjikā dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o
119 Q2119 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, cha71KG13176rgyud 'grel
159a6-280a4 rgyud 'grel, cha 159a6-280a4 (vol.48, p.207) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba shrI tsakra saM ba ra pany+dzi kA nA ma śrīcakrasaṁvarapañjikā-nāma bāpabhati mi mnyam rdo rje/(atulyavajra) rin grags/(ratnakīrti) ces bya ba ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bA ba b+ha Ti'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /gzhung 'di'i tshang ni stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag lnga'o/ /rgya gar shar phyogs lha mo mkhar nas byung ba yi/ pan chen mkhas pa mi mnyam pa rdo rje dang / dbyer mo thang gi gra nas byung ba yi/ khams pa dge slong ba ri rin grags kyis/ bsgyur cing zhus te dgongs pa gtan la phab / skad slob gsar la phan don du/ rgya dpe ji bzhin bsgyur ba yin/ mkhas pa don gyi ched byed rnams/ bdag gis cung zad rtogs yod kyang / don 'gyur na byas sgra bzhin bsgyur/ /'jig rten pha rol don gyi phyir/ /rgyud 'grel yin pas 'jigs phyir ro/ /bal yul grong khyer yam bu ru pan 'ba' ro'i lha khang du/ /neng dang ba ris yon bdag byas/ /lo paNa gnyis kyis rgyud 'grel bsgyur// slob gnyer mdzad rnams mnyes par zhu
120 Q2120 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, cha71KG13176rgyud 'grel
280a5-362a7 rgyud 'grel, cha 280a5-362a7 (vol.48, p.256) rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel rat+na tsha da nA ma pany+tsi kA ratnagaṇa-nāma-pañjikā dka' rgyal mi thub zla ba/(durjayacandra) guṇaśrī ratnadharmakīrti tāraklaśu mtshan mchog bla ma nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa phyag bzhi nas khri phrag bcu'i phyag mtshan 'chang ba'i he ru ka las/ snying rje'i dbang gis lha mos btus pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dka' rgyal mi thub zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so
121 Q2121 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ja81KG13177rgyud 'grel
1b1-46b5 rgyud 'grel, ja 1b1-46b5 (vol.49, p.1) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel dpa' bo'i yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba shrI tsakra saM ba ra s+ya pany+dzi kA shU ra ma no dz+nyA nA ma śrīcakrasaṁvarasyapañjikā-śūramanojñā-nāma skal ldan grags pa/(bhavyakīrti) dharmaśrībhadra rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' grel dpa' bo'i yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po skal ldan grags pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrAi b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
122 Q2122 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ja81KG13177rgyud 'grel
46b6-79a4 rgyud 'grel, ja 46b6-79a4 (vol.49, p.20) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel shrI tsakra saM ba ra mU la tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA śrī-cakrasaṁvaramūlatantrapañjikā rgyal ba bzang po/(jayabhadra) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel/ /slob dpon rgyal ba bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /gzhung tshad sh+lau ka bdun brgya yod do
123 Q2123 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ja81KG13177rgyud 'grel
79a4-177a6 rgyud 'grel, ja 79a4-177a6 (vol.49, p.33) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs gnas thams cad rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba shrI tsakra saM ba ra sarba sA d+ha naM san+ni nA ma TI kA śrīcakraaṁvarasādhanasarvaśālinīṭīkā-nāma lha sbas/(devagupta) dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs gnas pa'i man ngag thams cad rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud du 'khrungs pa dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon lha sbas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
124 Q2124 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ja81KG13177rgyud 'grel
177a6-233b2 rgyud 'grel, ja 177a6-233b2 (vol.49, p.73) yon tan ma lus pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa sa man+ta gu Na sa li nI nA ma TI kA samantaguṇaśālinī-nāma-ṭīkā dba' bo rdo rje/(vīravajra) chos skyong /(dharmapāla) rin chen grags pa/(ratnakīrti) ma lus pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi gnas zhes bya ba dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnam 'grel slobs dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /khams pa ba ri lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grags pa dang / paN+Di ta chos skyong gis bsgyur cing zhus so
125 Q2125 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ja81KG13177rgyud 'grel
233b2-286b4 rgyud 'grel, ja 233b2-286b4 (vol.49, p.95) gnyis ka'i bshad sbyor zhes bya ba u b+ha ya ni paM d+ha nA ma ubhayanibandha-nāma tathāgatarakṣita darma blo gros/(dharmamati) tathāgatarakṣita gnyi ka'i bshad sbyar zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /lho phyogs a ti be sha'i yul/ /b+hats+tsha ma yi grong khyer du/ /kA ya ta yi rigs 'khrungs pa'i/ /rje btsun ta zhes grags pa las/ /gaM gA'i chu 'gram gtsug lag khang //rig pa'i gter gyi gnas su bsgyur

padārthaprakāśikā-nāma-śrīsśmbaramūlatantraṭīkā rdo rje/(vajra) parahita 'phags pa shes rab/(āryaprajā) dkyil 'khor bde mchog gi rgya cher bshad pa'i tshig don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //'bangs kyi smon lam grub pa mi 'gag chos/ /'bangs dang grogs kyi don zhus rjes gnang ba/ /mchog dag'i bsams la grags la 'phel bar smon/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang //zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o

151a7-286a6 rgyud 'grel, nya 151a7-286a6 (vol.49, p.266) rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi snying po 'dus pa nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma rtsa ba rtsa ba'i 'grel pa mU la tan+t+ra h+r-i da ya sang+g+ra/ a b+hi d+hA not+ta ra tan+t+ra/ mU la mU la br-it+ti mūlatantrahṛidayasaṁgrahābhidhānottaratantramūlamūlavṛitti śūraṁgavajra(śūraṁgamavajra) jānaśrīmitra 'phags pa shes rab/(āryaprajā) rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po man ngag thams cad mngon zhing nges par brjod pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa/_/slob dpon shU raM ga badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bde mchog gi rgyud 'bum chen po'i gdams ngag dang //de kho na nyid tshang bar bsdus pa man ngag thams cad kyi snying po nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa/_/bde mchog 'bum pa'i de kho na nyid nges par byed pa de kho na nyid kyi snying po zhes bya ba/_/sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po 'phags pa shes rab kyi dz+nyA na shrI mi tra'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin du bsgyur ba'o

135b6-176a2 rgyud 'grel, pha 135b6-176a2 (vol.52, p.164) dpal 'khor lo bde mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga shrI tsakra sam+ba ro da ya nA ma maN+Da la no pi ka śrīcakraśambarodaya-nāma-maṇḍalopāyikā dbu ba blo ldan pa/(ariṣṭadhīmat) slob dpon dbu ba blo ldan pas//dkyil 'khor thabs 'di byas pa yin//'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so
250 Q2250 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
176a2-180b3 rgyud 'grel, pha 176a2-180b3 (vol.52, p.180) lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba sa ha dzA maN+Da la t+r+yA lo ka sa dza nA ma sahajamaṇḍalatrayālokasaṁjanana-nāma jānaśrī zhi ba 'od/(śāntiprabhā) lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrIsa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi rgyal po pho rang zhi ba 'od kyis gsol ba btab nas bsgyur ba'o
251 Q2251 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
180b3-214a3 rgyud 'grel, pha 180b3-214a3 (vol.52, p.182) sgron ma bzhi'i TI kA zhes bya ba u o tsa tu rAM TI kA nA ma ālokacaturaṭīkā-nāma nag po/(kṛṣṇa) śrīdhara slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa'i/ sgron ma bzhi zhes bya ba'i man ngag gi TI kA las/ gsang ba'i sgron ma ste bzhi pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI d+ha ra nyid kyi zhal snga nas kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
252 Q2252 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
214a4-221b3 rgyud 'grel, pha 214a4-221b3 (vol.52, p.195) dpal rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs shrI badzra bA rA hI sA d+hA nA ma śrīvajravārāhīsādhana-nāma seng ge'i gdong can khyab 'jug sbas pa/(siṁhāhanana viṣṇugupta) prajākīrti rgyal sras 'jigs med lha/(rājaputra abhayadeva) dpal rgya nag byang phyogs lam gyi rim pa/ /rje btsun rdo rje phag mo sgrubs pa'i thabs/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po seng gdong can khyab 'jug sbas pas nges par sbyar ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal a wa d+hu tI chen po/ /rgyal sras 'jigs med lha'i zhal sngar shAkya'i dge slong rje btsun padz+nyA kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o
253 Q2253 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
221b3-223b8 rgyud 'grel, pha 221b3-223b8 (vol.52, p.198) grub pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs sid+d+hi badzra yo gi ni sA d+ha na siddhivajrayoginīsādhana indrabhūti nālendrapāda prajākīrti dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba snyan nas snyan zhal nas zhal su brgyud pa'i rjes su gnang ba'i gzhung lugs/ /slob dpon chen po dpal oD+yaNa gyi mi dbang in+d+ra b+hu tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal na len+d+ra pa dang / /lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kirtisa bsgyur ba'o
254 Q2254 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
224a1-227b2 rgyud 'grel, pha 224a1-227b2 (vol.52, p.199) dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba shrI badzra yo gi ni man+t+ra tat+t+wa/ nirde sha s+wA d+hiSh+Tha nA ma śrīvajrayoginīmantratattvasvādhiṣṭhānanirdeśa-nāma indrabhūti ye shes rdo rje/(jānavajra) mchog tu zab pa dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid nges par bstan pa/ slob dpon in+d+ra b+hu tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba ye shes rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
255 Q2255 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
227b2-228b3 rgyud 'grel, pha 227b2-228b3 (vol.52, p.201) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs badzra yo gi ni sA d+ha naM vajrayoginīsādhana lha bcam legs smin ka ra/(lakṣmīkara) dpal lha lcam legs smin ka ras mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrubs thabs rdzogs so
256 Q2256 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
228b3-229a4 rgyud 'grel, pha 228b3-229a4 (vol.52, p.201) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs rak+ta badzra yo gi ni sA d+ha na raktavajrayoginīsādhana ri khrod dbang phyug(śabareśvara) dpal ri khrod dbang phyugs gis bstan pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so
257 Q2257 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
229a4-229b4 rgyud 'grel, pha 229a4-229b4 (vol.52, p.201) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs su ka la badzra yo gi ni sA d+ha naM śuklavajrayoginīsādhana indrabodhi vairocana rgyal po in dra bo d+hi'i gzhung rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /bla ma bai ro tsa nas bsgyur
258 Q2258 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
229b4-232a1 rgyud 'grel, pha 229b4-232a1 (vol.52, p.202) dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs shrI badzra yo gi nI sA d+ha naM śrīvajrayoginīsādhana chos 'bar/(dharmajvāla) bsod nams 'byung gnas bzang po/(puṇyākarabhadra) dpal dang ldan pa'i rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas oD+yaNa nas byung pa'i dgongs pa'i bla na med pa dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang chen rna ba ru zhal du brgyud pa'i rim pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bsod nams 'byung gnas bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo tsA ba sma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o
259 Q2259 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
232a1-235b1 rgyud 'grel, pha 232a1-235b1 (vol.52, p.203) dpal de kho na nyid ye shes grub pa shrI tat+t+wa dz+nyA na si d+d+hi śrītattvajñānasiddhi stong nyid ting nge 'dzin/(śūnyatāsamādhi) blo ldan shes rab/(dhīmatpraja) varendraruci de kho na nyid ye shes yang dag par grub pa zhes bya ba dag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mkhas pa chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhal snga nas gyi zhabs kyi rdul la reg pa paN+Di ta stong nyid kying de 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i A tsaR+Ya b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse dang / /lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
260 Q2260 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
235b2-236a8 rgyud 'grel, pha 235b2-236a8 (vol.52, p.204) don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs sarbAr+tha si d+d+hi sA d+ha naM nA Ma sarvārthasiddhisādhana-nāma avadhūtapāda blo ldan shes rab/(dhīmatpraja) varendraruci don thams cad grub pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa/ grub pa brnyes pa a ba d+hu tI pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i A tsaR+Ya b+ha ran+d+ra ru tse dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
261 Q2261 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
236b1-239a1 rgyud 'grel, pha 236b1-239a1 (vol.52, p.204) ye shes dbab pa zhes bya ba dz+nyA na be sha nA ma jñānāveśa-nāma stong nyid ting nge 'dzin/(śūnyatāsamādhi) blo ldan shes rab/(dhīmatpraja) varendraruci ye shes dbab pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'i mchog dpal stong nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i A tsaR+Ya b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
262 Q2262 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
239a1-240a6 rgyud 'grel, pha 239a1-240a6 (vol.52, p.205) rdo rje phag mo dbu bcad ma'i sgrub thabs tshin+da muN+Da badzra bA rA hI sA d+ha naM chinnamuṇḍavajravārāhīsādhana lha mo dpal gyi blo gros ma/(śrīmatidevā) blo ldan shes rab/(dhīmatpraja) varendraruci lha mo dpal gyi blo gros mas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta A tsaR+Ya b+ha ren+d+ra ru tsa dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
263 Q2263 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
240a6-243a2 rgyud 'grel, pha 240a6-243a2 (vol.52, p.206) dbu bcad ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba tshin+da muN+Da sA d+ha naM nA ma chinnamuṇḍasādhana-nāma virūpa chos 'bar/(dharmajvāla) varendraruci dbu bcad ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po birba pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba rma chos gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
264 Q2264 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
243a2-243b6 rgyud 'grel, pha 243a2-243b6 (vol.52, p.207) dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga shrI badzra yo gi ni ho ma bi d+hi śrīvajrayoginīhomavidhi sangs rgyas byin/(buddhadatta) blo ldan shes rab/(dhīmatpraja) varendraruci dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bzhed pa las gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po bsod snyoms pa'i slob ma rgyal bas byin gyi cho bo sangs rgyas byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i paN+Di ta b+ha ren+d+ra ru tse dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
265 Q2265 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
243b6-250b1 rgyud 'grel, pha 243b6-250b1 (vol.52, p.207)rgyud 'grel, pha
243b6-250b1 rigs ldan ma'i de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba ku li ka man+ta tat+wA nir+NA ma kulikamātātattvanirṇaya-nāma oḍḍiyānasiddha dīpaṁkara rigs ldan ma'i de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba oD+yaNa du grub pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dI paM ka ra'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
3977 Q2266 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
250b1-253a7 rgyud 'grel, pha 250b1-253a7 (vol.52, p.210) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs
vajrayoginīsādhana de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu rdzogs so
267 Q2267 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
253a7-253b6 rgyud 'grel, pha 253a7-253b6 (vol.52, p.211) ru sbal zhabs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kurma pA da sid+d+hi sA d+ha naM kūrmapādasiddhisādhana ānandakara chos kyi bzang po/(dharmabhadra) rngon pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta A nan+da ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ oM ma ru tse/ ma ra Ne/ pra ba tA ya hUM phaTa swA hA/ zhes pas phreng ba byin gyis brlabs na bye ba 'gyur ro/ /zhes mdo sde tshangs pa'i dra ba las gsungs pa yin no/ /kurma pA da'i sgrubs thabs dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
268 Q2268 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
253b7-254b4 rgyud 'grel, pha 253b7-254b4 (vol.52, p.211) kU rma pA da zhes bya ba'i gdams pa phag mo thugs kyi bsgrub thabs
kūrmapādopadeśa-nāma-vārāhīmanaḥsādhana ānandakara chos kyi bzang po/(dharmabhadra) kur+ma pA da zhes bya ba'i gdams pa phag mo thugs kyi bsgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta A nan+ta ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang dpyal lo tsA ba dpyal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur pa'o
269 Q2269 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
254b5-255b1 rgyud 'grel, pha 254b5-255b1 (vol.52, p.212) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mkha' spyod ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs khe tsa ra rak+ta badzra yo gi na sA d+ha naM khecararaktavajrayoginīsādhana rngon pa/(lubdhaka) chos kyi bzang po/(dharmabhadra) nikaliṅka sgrub thob rngon pa'i zhal snga nas kyi rim pa mkha' spyod ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//bla ma rdo rje gdan pa ni ka ling ka'i zhal snga nas//dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'
270 Q2270 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
255b1-261a2 rgyud 'grel, pha 255b1-261a2 (vol.52, p.212) slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba shik+Sh+ya nu gra ha bi d+ho nA ma śiṣyānugrahaviddhi-nāma śābaripāda gautamabhadra nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po/(sūryadhvajaśrībhadra) slob ma rjes su bzung pa'i cho ga ces bya ba grub thob sha ba ri pa nges mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /yul ma ga d+ha'i paN+Di ta go ta ma b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te/ lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsang nyang ro chong ngus kyi sa'i cha la chos gnas chen po gnyal sper legs par bsgyur ba'o
271 Q2271 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
261a2-263a8 rgyud 'grel, pha 261a2-263a8 (vol.52, p.214) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dbang mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba badzra yo gi n+yA b+hi She ka saM k+She pa nA ma vajrayoginyabhiṣekasaṁkṣepa-nāma śābaripāda gautamabhadra nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po/(sūryadhvajaśrībhadra) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba grub pa thob pa sha ba ri zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar yul ma gau d+ha'i paN+Di ta go ta ma b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsang tshong dus 'gur mo'i sa cha/ chos gnas chen po gnyal sper legs par bsgyur ba'o
272 Q2272 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
263b1-265a1 rgyud 'grel, pha 263b1-265a1 (vol.52, p.215) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba badzra yo gi ni ga na tsakra bi d+hi nA ma vajrayoginīgaṇacakravidhi-nāma śābaripāda gautamabhadra nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po/(sūryadhvajaśrībhadra) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba grub pa thob pa sha ba ri zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ yul ma ga d+ha'i paN+Di ta gau ta ma b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan ste/ lo tsA ba shAkyi dge slong nya ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ nya ro khris kyi gtsug khang du bsgyur ba'o
273 Q2273 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
265a2-279a7 rgyud 'grel, pha 265a2-279a7 (vol.52, p.216) rnal 'byor gyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i 'grel pa yo gA nu pa ri NI nA ma badzra yo gi nI TI kA yogānusāriṇī-nāma-vajrayoginīṭīkā dārika dānaśīla dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i 'grel pa chos bcu'i mchod pa'i rtog pa/ grub tho chen pi dA ri ka pas mdza pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta dpal mkhas pa chen po dA na shi las bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po rir lha'i skad las bod kyi skad du 'khrul pa med pa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so
274 Q2274 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
279a8-279b6 rgyud 'grel, pha 279a8-279b6 (vol.52, p.221) snying po'i don bsdus pa bstan pa
sārārthasaṁgrahopadeśa klu'i sbyin pa'i rnal 'byor/(nāgadattayogin) dānaśīla paN+Di ta klu'i sbyin pa'i rnal 'byor snying po'i don bsdus pa bstan pa'o/ /grub pa thos pa'i gnas drang srong srin po rir rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las lha'i skad du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so
275 Q2275 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
279b6-281b3 rgyud 'grel, pha 279b6-281b3 (vol.52, p.222) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga badzra yo gi ni pU dza bi d+hi vajrayoginīpūjāvidhi dārikapāda dānaśīla dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i man ngag slob dpon chen po dA ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las bod yul dbus kyi drang srong srin po ril rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o
276 Q2276 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
281b3-283a8 rgyud 'grel, pha 281b3-283a8 (vol.52, p.222) keng rus tA ra nga'i sgrub thabs kaM ka la tA ra na sA d+ha naM kaṁkālatāraṇasādhana dārikapāda rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrubs thabs bdag byin gyis brlabs pa dpal rdo rje gdan na bzhugs pa/ lha 'dre bran du 'khor ba'i slob dpon chen po dA ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
277 Q2277 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
283b1-289b3 rgyud 'grel, pha 283b1-289b3 (vol.52, p.223) keng rus tA ra Na'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa gzhan la phan pa zhes bya ba kaM ka la tA ra na sA d+ha naM TI kA pa ra hi ta nA ma kaṁkālatāraṇasādhanaṭīkā-parahitā-nāma kumārabodhi keng rus tA ra na'i rim pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i 'grel pa gzhan phan pa zhes bya ba mang du thos pa'i slob dpon ku mA ra b+ho d+hisa mdzad pa rdzogs so
3978 Q2278 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
289b4-293a2 rgyud 'grel, pha 289b4-293a2 (vol.52, p.226) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba badzra yo gi ni sA d+ha naM nA Ma vajrayoginīsādhana-nāma jalandhara(jālaṁdhara) rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dza lan+d+ha ras mdzad pa rdzogs so
279 Q2279 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
293a3-293b8 rgyud 'grel, pha 293a3-293b8 (vol.52, p.227) rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs badzra bA rA hI sA d+ha naM vajravārāhīsādhana rdo rje dril bu pa/(vajraghaṇṭa) chos kyi dbang phyug(dharmeśvara) sumatikīrti rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa chen po mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3982 Q2280 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
294a1-294b3 rgyud 'grel, pha 294a1-294b3 (vol.52, p.227) rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs badzra bA rA hI sA d+ha nAM vajravārāhīsādhana chos kyi dbang phyug(dharmeśvara) dpal oD+ya Na rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gnas nas rnam par byung ba rdo rje phag mo'i sgrubs thabs rdzogs so/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba ban de mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug nyid kyis bgyur ba'o
281 Q2281 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
294b3-299a1 rgyud 'grel, pha 294b3-299a1 (vol.52, p.228) rdo rje phag mo dkar mo'i sgrub thabs su kha la badzra bA rA hI sA d+ha naM śuklavajravārāhīsādhana kokadatta dharmakīrti rakṣita rdo rje phag mo dkar mo'i sgrub thabs slob dpon kong ki spyan gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rakri tI zhal snga nas/ lo tsA ba mkhas pa ba ri d+harma kIrtisa zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o
282 Q2282 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel
299a1-300a8 rgyud 'grel, pha 299a1-300a8 (vol.52, p.229) dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba shrI badzra bA rA hI pra dz+nyA lo gekr-it+ya sto tra nA ma śrīvajravārāhīprajñālokakṛityāstotra-nāma koṅkanapāda ratnarakṣita grub pa dpal bzang po/(siddhiśrībhadra) dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod pa slob dpon kong ka na pA ngas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

3979 Q2290 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pha151KG13184rgyud 'grel

1b1-139b6 rgyud 'grel, ba 1b1-139b6 (vol.53, p.1) kye'i rdo rje bsdus pa'i don gyi rgya cher 'grel pa ha badzra pIN DAr+tha TI kA hevajrapiṇḍārthaṭīkā rdo rje snying po/(vajragarbha) dānaśīla prajkīrti subhūtiśrīśānti blo gros brtan pa/ dbang phyug grags pa/ 'jig med lha/ kye'i rdo rje bsdus pa stong phrag drug par/ de kho na nyid nges pa mdor bstan pa'i mdor bsdus chen po'i/ de ltar kho na nyid kyi le'u rdzogs so/ /dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bsdus pa'i don gyis 'grel pa rdzogs so/ /rje btsun byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shi la dang / lo tsA ba 'bro seng dkar shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hU ti shrI shAn+ti dang / /lo tsA ba cog gru ting nge 'dzin bzang pos zhus so/ /yang slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal po'i sras/ /dpal 'jig med lha'i zhal sngar lo tsA ba snyel cor dge slong pradz+nyA kIrtisa yul dbus 'gyur gyi dpes gtan la phab pa/ /slar yang dpal ldan shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs par gshad pa la sogs pa'i mthu las/ brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa'i dpang lo tsA ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel pa bskor gsum gyi tshula la shin tu dad cing blo'i snang ba rgyas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ra lung pa chos gags dpal bzang pos/ slob dpon chen po zhi ba 'tsho'i zhabs dpon slob kyis mdzad pa'i/ dbu ma'i gzhung lugs chen po de kho na nyid bsdus pa rtsa 'gril gyi glegs bam bris te yon du gnang nas yang dang yang du bskul ba'i dor legs par bcos te bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan nas phab pa'i yi ge pa ni 'dzad ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o
311 Q2311 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ba161KG13185rgyud 'grel

313 Q2313 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ma171KG13186rgyud 'grel
1b1-72b8 rgyud 'grel, ma 1b1-72b8 (vol.53, p.127) dgyes pa rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yo ga rat+na mA la nA ma he badzra pany+tsi kA yogaratnamālā-nāma-hevajrapañjikā nag po pa/(kṛṣṇa) tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) kṛiṣnapaṇḍita dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel/ rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las/ brtags pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor pa nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
314 Q2314 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ma171KG13186rgyud 'grel
73a1-351a8 rgyud 'grel, ma 73a1-351a8 (vol.53, p.157) rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal khye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyar shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba shrI he badzra tan+t+ra rA dzA TI kA su bi Sha da saM bu Ta nA ma śrīhevajratantrarājaṭīkā-suviśadasaṁputa-nāma dhaṁkadāśa blo brtan/(sthiramati) vimalaśrībhadra rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon chen po d+haM ka dA shas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /smin drug zla ba la ni paN+Di ta mchog dpal ldan chos kyi rgyal po'i bkas/ kye yi rdo rje'i 'grel bshal yon tan mchog ldan d+haM ka dA shas mdzad pa ni/ gang zhig dpan ldan kha che'i yul du 'khrungs pa dri med dpal zhes mtshan gsol dang / s+thi ra ma ti'i rnam rgyas mdzes pa dag gis 'dir ni legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i yan tan mtha' yas pa brnyes pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung gis dpon zhang btsun gyis ton bdag byas te phye dang nang ge gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal nas/ /bod kyo lo tsA ba dge slong blo brtan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni slong bsod nams dbang phyug ces bya ba'o
315 Q2315 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tsa181KG13187rgyud 'grel
1b1-69a2 rgyud 'grel, tsa 1b1-69a2 (vol.53, p.269) kau mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel kau mu di pany+dzi kA nA ma kaumudī-nāma-pañjikā sbyang dka' ba'i zla ba/(durjayacandra) prajendraruci shAkya ye shes/(śākyajāna) slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel kau mu di zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA in+d+ra ru tsi dang /lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yi shes kyis bsgyur ba'o
316 Q2316 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tsa181KG13187rgyud 'grel
69a3-169b3 rgyud 'grel, tsa 69a3-169b3 (vol.54, p.1) rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdud pa'i dka' 'grel badzra pA di sA ra saM gra ha pany+dzi kA vajrapadasārasaṁgrahapañjikā nāro chos kyi bzang po/(dharmabhadra) shAkya shrI bzang po/(śākyaśrībhadra) dpang blo gros brtan pa/ ra lung pa chos grags dpal bzang po/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la kha che chen pos rtogs pa gnas brtan dul ba'i dpal bshes gnyen gyis gsol ba btab pa rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du brtag pa gnyis pa le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so/ /kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI bzang po'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos/ dpal bkra shis gser sdings kyi gtsug lag khang du legs par zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slar yang dpal ldan shong rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi legs bshad la sogs pa'i mthu las/ brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa'i dpang lo tsA pa dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel pa bskor gsum gyi tshul la shin tu dang cing blo'i snang ba rgyas pa'i dge bi bshes gnyen ra lung pa chos grags dpal bzang pos/ slob dpon zhi ba 'tsho'i zhabs dpon slob kyis mdzad pa'i dbu ma'i gzhung lugs chen po de kho na nyid bsdus pa rtsa 'grel gyi glegs bam bris te yon du gnang nas/ yang yang du bskul ba'i ngor legs par bcos pa bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni/ 'dzad ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o
317 Q2317 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tsa181KG13187rgyud 'grel
169b3-228b2 rgyud 'grel, tsa 169b3-228b2 (vol.54, p.41) rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba sgyu ma brtag pa gnyis pa'i dka' 'grel dran pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba he badzra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza kalpa mA yA s+ya pany+dzi ka smr-i ti ni ba da nA ma hevajra-nāma-mahātantrarājadvikalpamāyasya pañjikā-smṛitinipāda-nāma nag po/(kṛṣna) lha btsas/(devasūta) dpal ldan zla ba/(śrīmaccandra) brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal ldan zla ba dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mgos lha bcas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

1b1-13b6 rgyud 'grel, tsha 1b1-13b6 (vol.54, p.265) dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rdo rje'i tshig btu ba zhes bya ba shrI he badzra s+ya/ badzra pa dod+d+ha ra Na nA ma oany+tsi kA śrīhevajrasya pañjikā-vajrapadoddharaṇa-nāma kāmadhenu chos kyi shes rab/(dharmapraja) vinayadeva dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel/ rdo rje'i tshig btu ba zhes bya ba nang gi don bshad pa/ slob dpon chen po kA ma d+he nu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi na ya de ba dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

13b6-50a8 rgyud 'grel, tsha 13b6-50a8 (vol.54, p.271) dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi don bsdus pa shrI he badzra nA ma tan+t+rAr+tha saM gra ha śrīhevajranāmatantrārthasaṁgraha da ni brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa ston te/ le'u 'di las ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lus kyi mtshan ma dang / lag pa'i ri mo dang / kha dog gi mtshan ma rnams ston te/ brda phrad sla bas ma bres so

106b4-364a7 rgyud 'grel, tsha 106b4-364a7 (vol.55, p.1) dpal kha sbyor thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa yang par lta ba'i dran pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba shrI sam+bu Ti ti la kA nA ma yo gI nI tan+t+ra rA dza s+ya TI kA smr-i ti san+da nA lo ka nA ma śrīsaṁpuṭatilaka-nāma-yoginītantrarājasya ṭīkā-smṛitisaṁdarśanāloka-nāma indrabodhi zla ba'i 'od zer/(candraprabha) vajrabodhi dpal kha sbyor thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa bcu'i bdag nyid kyi rgya cher 'grel pa yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pa'i snang ba zhes pa'i gzhung rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI badz+ra bo d+hi dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po gyi co zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

1b1-121a8 rgyud 'grel, wa 1b1-121a8 (vol.55, p.251) rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun tu kha sbyor zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher bshad pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba sarba tan+t+ra s+ya ni dA na ma hA gu h+ya shrI sam+pu Ta tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma TI kA rat+na ma la nA ma sarvatantrasya nidānamahāguhyaśrīsampuṭa-nāma-tantrarājaṭīkāratnamālā-nāma dpa' bo rdo rje/(vīravajra) rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun tu kha sbyor las byung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa rin che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpa' bo rdo rje'i zhal mnga' nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

121a8-170a1 rgyud 'grel, wa 121a8-170a1 (vol.55, p.300) dpal zab mo'i don gsal ba rmad du byung ba chen po zhes bya ba shrI gu h+yA r+tha pra sa ka ma hA ad+b+hu ta nA ma śrīguhyārthaprakāśamahādbhūta-nāma zab pa'i rdo rje/(gambhīravajra) shes rab dpal gsang ba/(prajāśrīgupta) gyung drung snying po/(sanātanagarbha) 'di ni dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las zab ba'i don gsal ba rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ don gsal ba rgya cher bshad pa/ u rgyan gyi slob dpon phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyed pa/ slob dpon zab pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po shes rab dpal gsang ba'i zhal sngar da 'og dge slong g.yung drung snying pos dad cing gus pas yang dang yang du zhus pa'i ngor mdzad nas phyis kun nas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

204b4-222a2 rgyud 'grel, zha 204b4-222a2 (vol.56, p.164) kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par dag pa'i gter zhes bya ba bi shud+d+ha ni d+hi nA ma he badzra sA d+ha naM viśuddhanidhi-nāma-hevajrasādhana gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje/(advayavajra maitrīpapāda) gzhon nu dpal/(kumāraśrī) dpal nags kyi rin chen/(vanaratna) dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par dag pa'i gter zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa chen po gnyis med pa'i rdo rje a ba d+hU tI pa/ dpal mai tri zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkhan po chen po/ dpal nags kyi rin chen gyis spyan sngar/ dpal kye rdo rje'i lam kyi stegs bu las/ bde ba chen po'i khang bzangs su nye bar 'jogs pa/ mi'i dbang po grags pa 'byung nas kyis gsol ba btab pa las/ paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang /gzhon nu dpal gyis pho brang sne gdong du bsgyur ba'o/ /'di'i gzhung tshang ni rgya dpe la tshigs su bcad pa bdun cu lhag pa'i sum brgya'o zhes so

535b7-538a8 rgyud 'grel, zha 535b7-538a8 (vol.56, p.296) dpal kye'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba shrI he badzra ba liM bi d+hi nA ma śrīhevajrabalividhi-nāma dpal kye'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so
411 Q2411 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel
538a8-539b1 rgyud 'grel, zha 538a8-539b1 (vol.56, p.297) kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga he badzra ba liM bi d+h inA ma śrīhevajrabalividhi-nāma bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa rdzogs so
412 Q2412 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel

413 Q2413 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel
540a4-544a1 rgyud 'grel, zha 540a4-544a1 (vol.56, p.298) thig le chen po'i rim pa zhes bya ba ma hA ti la ka kra ma nA ma mahātilakakrama-nāma sgeg pa'i rdo rje/(līlāvajra) dpal thig le chen po'i rim pa zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
414 Q2414 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel
544a1-548a7 rgyud 'grel, zha 544a1-548a7 (vol.56, p.299) bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba b+ha ga bAM he badzra sA d+ha na ma b+hi sa ma ya kra mAr+tha pra sa nA ma bhagavadd-hevajrasādhana-abhisamayakramārthaprasanna-nāma bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so
3991 Q2415 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel
548a8-550b8 rgyud 'grel, zha 548a8-550b8 (vol.56, p.301) dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs shrI he badzra sA d+ha naM śrīhevajrasādhana nāḍapāda dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i gtso bo sems dpa' gsum gyi sgrub thabs rje na ro pa'i zhal gyi lung sbyar ba rdzogs so
416 Q2416 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel
550b8-565a5 rgyud 'grel, zha 550b8-565a5 (vol.56, p.302) de kho na nyid kyi snang ba zhes bya ba tat+t+wa lo ka nA ma tattvāloka-nāma 'jig rten mgon po/(sahaśrī lokanātha) somanātha le'u ston rgya nag de kho na nyid kyi snang ba rdzogs so/ kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA thas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/ le'u ston rgya nag gis nan gyis zhus pa'o
417 Q2417 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel
565a5-585a4 rgyud 'grel, zha 565a5-585a4 (vol.56, p.308) dgyes pa rdo rje'i lag tu blang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba he badzra s+ya ha sta bya ba ra kra ma nA ma hevajrasya hastavyavagrāhakrama-nāma bsod nams rgyal mtshan/(puṇyadhvaja) bsod nams rgyal mtshan/(puṇyadhvaja) bod kyi lo tsA ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis/ gzhung dag las ni gsungs pa yin mod kyang / bla mas rang la rang gis gzhan la ste/ mdzad pa'i rim pa bsdus shing legs par bsgyur ba rdzogs so
4000 Q2418 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zha231KG13192rgyud 'grel
585a4-587a7 rgyud 'grel, zha 585a4-587a7 (vol.56, p.316)rgyud 'grel, zha
585a4-587a7 gtor ma'i cho ga ba liM bi d+hi balividhi mar me mdzad ye shes/(dīpaṁkarajāna) 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
419 Q2419 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
1b1-17a8 rgyud 'grel, za 1b1-17a8 (vol.57, p.1) kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa'i cho ga he badzra maN+Da la karma ka ma bi d+hi hevajramaṇḍalakarmakramavidhi mtsho skyes rdo rje/(saroruhavajra) gayadhara shAkya ye shes/(śākyajāna) bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa/ cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa ma nor pa rdzogs so/ slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
420 Q2420 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
17a8-27b3 rgyud 'grel, za 17a8-27b3 (vol.57, p.9) dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs he badzra sA d+ha naM hevajrasādhana yan lag med pa'i rdo rje/(anaṅgavajra) tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) kun tu bzang po/(samantabhadra) dpal rnal 'byor pa yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kun tu bzang po dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
421 Q2421 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
27b3-29a8 rgyud 'grel, za 27b3-29a8 (vol.57, p.13) he ru ka'i sgrub thabs shrI he ru ka sA d+ha naM śrīherukasādhana sahajavilāsa chos 'bar/(dharmajvāla) varendraruci dgyes pa rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ slob dpon chen po sa ha dza bi la sa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba ren+d+ra ru tse'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o
422 Q2422 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
29a8-31a2 rgyud 'grel, za 29a8-31a2 (vol.57, p.13) man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba tri kra mo pa de sha nA ma trikramopadeśa-nāma ḍombiheruka man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
423 Q2423 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
31a2-34b8 rgyud 'grel, za 31a2-34b8 (vol.57, p.14) go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa'i ming bra ti ka ra h+r-i da sha ta ka nA ma pratikarahṛidayaśatakanāma snang ba mtha' yas rdo rje/(amitābhavajra) dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las slob dpon chen po snang ba mtha' yas rdo rjes mdzad pa'i go byed snying po rdzogs so/ don gyi go byed snying po na gnyis med do/ mtshon par byed pa'i go byed snying po ni tshig dang yi ge'o
424 Q2424 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
34b8-42b4 rgyud 'grel, za 34b8-42b4 (vol.57, p.16)rgyud 'grel, za
34b8-42b4 dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba shrI he badzra rat+na +ra lo k+ye sA d+ha naM nA ma śrīhevajrasādhanaratnapradīpa-nāma mar me mdzad ye shes/(dīpaṁkarajāna) dānaśrī glan darma blo gros/(glan dharmamati) dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dA na shrAi dang / lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus so
425 Q2425 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
42b4-60a2 rgyud 'grel, za 42b4-60a2 (vol.57, p.19) dbang bskur ba'i cho ga
abhiṣekavidhi prajāśrī dbang bskur ba'i cho ga slob dpon chen po pradz+nyA shris mdzad pa rdzogs so
426 Q2426 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
60a2-61b5 rgyud 'grel, za 60a2-61b5 (vol.57, p.26) dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba shrI he badzra maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma śrīhevajramaṇḍalavidhi-nāma ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma nigu ma/(jānaḍākinī nigu) glan darma blo gros/(glan dharmamati) rdo rje ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dpal dgyes mdzad rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma ni gu mas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rdo rje ye shes mkha' 'gro ma de nyid dang / lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o
427 Q2427 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
61b5-64a3 rgyud 'grel, za 61b5-64a3 (vol.57, p.26) brtse ba'i rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs he badzra Sho Da sa b+hu dza sA d+ha naM hevajraṣoḍaśabhujasādhana kṛṣṇa dpal dgyes pa rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ paN+Di ta A tsaR+Ya kriSh+Na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
428 Q2428 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
64a3-70a1 rgyud 'grel, za 64a3-70a1 (vol.57, p.27) dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i rim pa shrI he badzra ba liM kra ma śrīhevajrabalikrama ahovajra zla ba'i 'od zer/(candraprabha) kāyastha gayadhara dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa/ slob dpon chen po a la la badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta kas+tha pa ga thA ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o

70a1-72b4 rgyud 'grel, za 70a1-72b4 (vol.57, p.30) gtor ma'i las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba ba liM karma kra ma nA ma balikarmakrama-nāma rin chen rdo rje/(ratnavajra) slob dpon chen po kha che rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
430 Q2430 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
72b4-73b5 rgyud 'grel, za 72b4-73b5 (vol.57, p.31) 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba
sarvabhūtabalividhi-nāma nag po/(kṛṣṇa) nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po/(sūryadhvajaśrībhadra) 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
431 Q2431 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
73b6-80a5 rgyud 'grel, za 73b6-80a5 (vol.57, p.31) kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs he badzra sA d+ha no pi ka hevajrasādhana 'jam dpal ye shes/(majuśrījāna) dharmabhadra 'jam dpal ye shes/(majuśrījāna) slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal ye shes zhabs kyi mdzad pa/ he badz+ra'i sgrub thabs he ru ka mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so
432 Q2432 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
80a5-84a8 rgyud 'grel, za 80a5-84a8 (vol.57, p.34) dpal kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag shrI he badzra nA ma sA d+ha no pi ka śrīhevajra-nāma-sādhanopāyikā ānandavajra dgyes pa'i rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po shrI A nan+da badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so

homakarmakrama rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal/(yogīśvaraśrī) rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal gyis zhabs kyis bshad pa rdzogs so
434 Q2434 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
87a5-88b5 rgyud 'grel, za 87a5-88b5 (vol.57, p.37) dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la bstod pa shrI he badzra sto tra śrīhevajrastotra rin chen rdo rje/(ratnavajra) byang chub shes rab/(bodhipraja) kumārakalaśa dpal rje btsun dgyes pa'i rdo rje la bstod pa rig pa'i gnas ma lus pa la mkhas pa sgrub pa'i slob dpon kha che yul du 'khrungs pa dpal rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la shi dang /lo tsA ba dge slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
435 Q2435 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
88b5-91b1 rgyud 'grel, za 88b5-91b1 (vol.57, p.37) bdag med rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs nai rAt+ma yo gi ni sA d+ha naM nairātmāyoginīsādhana ḍombiheruka gayadhara shAkya ye shes/(śākyajāna) bdud rtsi 'od kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o
436 Q2436 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
91b1-94a2 rgyud 'grel, za 91b1-94a2 (vol.57, p.38) bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs nairAt+ma sA d+ha naM nA ma nairātmāsādhana-nāma mi thub zla ba/(durjayacandra) gayadhara shAkya ye shes/(śākyajāna) mkhas pa chen po dpal mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'i bdag med pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o
437 Q2437 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
94a2-95a3 rgyud 'grel, za 94a2-95a3 (vol.57, p.39) bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga la bstod pa nai rAt+ma de bI pany+tsa da sha sto tra nairātmādevīpañcādaśastotra mi thub zla ba/(durjayacandra) slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'o
438 Q2438 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
95a3-99b5 rgyud 'grel, za 95a3-99b5 (vol.57, p.40) bdag med ma'i rab tu gsal ba nai rAt+ma pra ka sa nairātmāprakāśa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje/(advayavajra) jānākara vajrapāṇi dpal paN+Di ta gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni las mnyan te slad kyis dge slong mtshur dz+nyA nA ka ras bsgyur ba'o
439 Q2439 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
99b5-103b6 rgyud 'grel, za 99b5-103b6 (vol.57, p.42) bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba nai rAt+ma sA d+ha nAM pauSh+Ti ka nirde sha nairātmāsādhanapauṣṭikanirdeśanāma dkon mchog 'byung gnas/(ratnākara) bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rgyas par bstan pa/ dpal dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
440 Q2440 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
103b6-104a7 rgyud 'grel, za 103b6-104a7 (vol.57, p.43) bdag med ma dpa' mo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bskyed pa dang rdzogs par ldan pa zhes bya ba
utpādanasamāpti-nāma-nairātmaikavīrāsādhana sgra gcan 'dzin/(rāhula) prajendraruci shAkya ye shes/(śākyajāna) dpa' gcig ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed pa dang rdzogs par ldan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon bsod snyoms pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA in+d+ra ru tsi dang / dge slong shAkya yi shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o
441 Q2441 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
104a7-106a2 rgyud 'grel, za 104a7-106a2 (vol.57, p.43) bdag med ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs nai rAt+ma sA d+ha naM nairātmāsādhana kṛṣṇapaṇḍita kriSh+Na paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so
442 Q2442 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
106a2-116a7 rgyud 'grel, za 106a2-116a7 (vol.57, p.44) bdag med ma'i man ngag ces bya ba nai rAt+ma ko pa de sha nA ma nairātmakopadeśa-nāma ting nge 'dzin rdo rje/(samādhivajra) devākaracandra bsod nams rgyal mtshan/(puṇyadhvaja) 'di mdzad pa'i slob dpon yang brtan pa'i 'khor lo dpal 'jam dpa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po/ dpal bzang po'i zhabs kyi pad+ma las skyes/ zhabs kyi rdul la brtse ba mchog tu gyur pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bka' drin las skyes pa paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhabs zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de bA ka ra tsan+d+ra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dpyal ser rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur pa'o
443 Q2443 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
116a7-119b2 rgyud 'grel, za 116a7-119b2 (vol.57, p.48) bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs nai rAt+ma maN+Da la tsakra sA d+ha naM nairātmāmaṇḍalacakrasādhana bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tsakra'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so
444 Q2444 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
119b2-121a8 rgyud 'grel, za 119b2-121a8 (vol.57, p.50) dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rim pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa ku ru ku l+le'i sgrub thabs shrI he badzra tan+t+ra me na s+wA tiSh+Tha na ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM śrīhevajratantrakrame svādhiṣṭhānakurukullāsādhana lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa/(sahajalalita) bdag byin gyis brlab pa ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pas rdzogs so
445 Q2445 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
121b1-121b8 rgyud 'grel, za 121b1-121b8 (vol.57, p.50) bla ma'i man ngag
gurūpadeśa don yod rdo rje/(amoghavajra) rin chen grags pa/(ratnakīrti) bla ma'i man ngag rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o
446 Q2446 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
122a1-122b3 rgyud 'grel, za 122a1-122b3 (vol.57, p.51) dgyes pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru ku l+le'i sgrub thabs he badzrod+b+ha ba ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM hevajrodbhavakurukullāsādhana lhan skyes sgegs pa/(sahajavilāsa) dānaśīla dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje brten pa'i lha mo ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po lhan skyes sgeg pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ dA na shAi la nyid kyis bsgyur
447 Q2447 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
122b4-123b3 rgyud 'grel, za 122b4-123b3 (vol.57, p.51)rgyud 'grel, za
122b4-123b3 kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru ku l+le'i man ngag chen po lnga he badzrod+b+ha ba ku ru kul+le yA pany+tsa ma ho pa de shaH hevajrodbhavakurukullāyāḥ pañcamahopadeśa zhi ba 'tsho/(śāntirakṣita) dānaśīla kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i man ngag chen po lnga slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta dA na shAi la nyid kyis bsgyur ro
448 Q2448 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
123b3-124a1 rgyud 'grel, za 123b3-124a1 (vol.57, p.51) 'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru ku l+le'i bstod pa Ar+ya tA ra ku ru kul+le sto tra āryatārākurukullāstotra ḍombiheruka 'phags ma sgrol ma lha mo ku ru kul+le'i bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa rdzogs so
449 Q2449 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
124a1-125a8 rgyud 'grel, za 124a1-125a8 (vol.57, p.51) ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM kurukullāsādhana gzhon nu 'od/(kumāraprabha) vimala bcom ldan 'das ma ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta bim+ba dang / lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba
450 Q2450 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
125a8-127b7 rgyud 'grel, za 125a8-127b7 (vol.57, p.52) myur mdzad ma'i sgrub thabs ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM kurukullāsādhana chos kyi bzang po/(dharmabhadra) majuśrījāna oD+yaNa gyi yul nas byung ba'i lha mo ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po yul ma ga d+hara skyes pa dpal byang chub chen por rab tu byung ba'i gnas brtan many+dzu shrAi dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ro zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
451 Q2451 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
