453 Q2453 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
130a1-136a3 rgyud 'grel, za 130a1-136a3 (vol.57, p.54) mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba DA ki nI badzra pany+tsa ra pany+tsa DA ka sA d+ha naM nA Ma ḍākinīvajrapañjarapañcaḍākasādhana-nāma mi thub zla ba/(durjayacandra) līlāvajra bsod nams rgyal mtshan/(puṇyadhvaja) mi thub zla bas rnam par spras pa'i mkha' 'gro lnga'i bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po li la badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis/ rang gi dam chos gsal bar byed pas na/ rang dang gzhan gyi don du legs par bsgyur
454 Q2454 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
136a3-143b8 rgyud 'grel, za 136a3-143b8 (vol.57, p.56) dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sgrub thabs ShrI DA ki nI badzra pany+dza ra saM ha ra Na maN+Da la a nu re nA sA d+ha naM śrīḍākinīvajrapañjaramaṇḍalasaṁharaṇa-nāma-anusaraṇasādhana lha'i brtul zhugs/(devavrata) chos kyi blo gros/(dharmamati) mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi sgrub thabs dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i rjesu 'brang ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po lha'i brtul zhugs zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o
3992 Q2455 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
144a1-148b4 rgyud 'grel, za 144a1-148b4 (vol.57, p.59) de kho na nyid bcu pa da sha tat+t+wa daśatattva dri med grags pa/(vimalakīrti) chos kyi blo gros/(dharmamati) mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi man ngag de kho na nyid bcu pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chon po dri med grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba
456 Q2456 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
148b4-154b5 rgyud 'grel, za 148b4-154b5 (vol.57, p.61) rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs badzra tA ra sA d+ha naM vajratārāsādhana rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba/(ratnākaraśānti) dgra bcom/(arhat) buddhaśrījāna śākyaśrībhadra 'di ni dpal rin chena'abyunga gnas zhi ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/ paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang / paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra la zhus shing mnyan nas/ yul dbus kyi sgra bsgyur pa chag lo tsA ba dge slong dgra bcom gyi bsgyur ba'o
457 Q2457 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
154b5-164a8 rgyud 'grel, za 154b5-164a8 (vol.57, p.64) 'phags pa rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs Ar+ya badzra tA ra sA d+ha nA ma āryavajratārāsādhana sna tshogs dmar po/(citrāruṇa) dānaśīla rdo rje gur las byung ba grub thob chen po sna tshogs dmar po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shAi las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o
4255 Q2458 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel

166b8-168a5 rgyud 'grel, za 166b8-168a5 (vol.57, p.68) dpal rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs shrI badzra tA ra sA d+ha naM śrīvajratārāsādhana dge ba'i mgon po/(śubhanātha) buddhaśrībhadra byams pa'i dpal/(maitrīśrī) dpal ldan rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dge ba'i mgon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta chen po bu d+d+ha shrI b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
460 Q2460 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
168a5-169a1 rgyud 'grel, za 168a5-169a1 (vol.57, p.69) ro bsreg pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba sa ma ho ma bi d+hi nA ma śmaśānavidhi-nāma blo gros chen po/(mahāmati) avadhūtapāda ba ri lo tsA ba dam tshig ldan pa rnams kyi ro bsreg pa'i cho ga/ rdo rje gur nas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pa dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o
461 Q2461 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel
169a1-170b1 rgyud 'grel, za 169a1-170b1 (vol.57, p.69) ro bsreg bya ba Sh+ma shA meSh+Ta śmaśāneṣṭa tathāgatarakṣita darma blo gros/(dharmamati) tathāgatarakṣita ro bsreg pa bya ba dge slong ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur pa'o
462 Q2462 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, za241KG13193rgyud 'grel

171a1-179b6 rgyud 'grel, za 171a1-179b6 (vol.57, p.70) dpal rin po che'i char yang zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs shrI ma hA rat+na kA la nA ma sA d+ha naM ba ye kA śrīmahāratnakālanāmasādhanopāyikā shes rab gsang ba/(prajāgupta) dpal rin po che char yang zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal shes rab gsang bas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa

253b5-260b8 rgyud 'grel, za 253b5-260b8 (vol.57, p.103) gsang chen dga' ba'i thig le zhes bya ba ra ha s+ya A nan+da ti la ka nA ma rahasyānandatilaka-nāma mahāmati chos kyi shes rab/(dharmapraja) du lo pa gsang chen dga' ba'i thig le zhes bya ba/ slob dpon yu so ma pu rir byung ba'i dge slong dpal ldan byang chub bzang po'i bla ma/ dpal ma hA ma ti'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon A tsaR+Ya du lo pa dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

260b3-407a8 rgyud 'grel, za 260b3-407a8 (vol.57, p.106) rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa'i 'grel pa dran pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba shrI tsa tur+pi Thi tan+t+ra rA dza s+ya smri ti ni ban+d+ha nA ma TI kA śrīcatuḥpīṭhatantrarājasya ṭīkāsmṛtinibandha-nāma bhava lhas btsas/(devasūta) gayadhara rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa'i 'grel pa dran pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyi gtan la phab ste bsgyur ba'o

481 Q2481 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, 'a251KG13194rgyud 'grel
91a4-101a8 rgyud 'grel, 'a 91a4-101a8 (vol.57, p.204)rgyud 'grel, 'a
91a4-101a8 rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dpal gdan bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs shrI tsa tu rbi thI yo ga tan+t+ra sA d+ha no pi ka śrīcatuḥpīṭhayogatantrasādhanopāyikā āryadeva kamalagupta rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon rje btsun AR+Ya de ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ma la gup+ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
482 Q2482 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, 'a251KG13194rgyud 'grel
101a8-129a6 rgyud 'grel, 'a 101a8-129a6 (vol.57, p.208) dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba shrI badzra tsa tur+pe thi sA d+ha naM nA maH śrīvajracatuḥpīṭhasādhana-nāma jagadānandajīvabhadra matibhvajaśrībhadra smra ba'i seng ge/(vādisiṁha) zhes pa gdan bzhi chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las phyung ba/ bdag gi gdan/ dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga /bla ma dam pa rnams kyi man ngag ltar shin tu rgyas par bkod cing / sgrub thabs 'bring po dang bsdus pa yang shugs la rtogs par 'gyur bas rmad du byung ba'i gdams pa 'di ni/ bal po'i paN+Di ta chen po rdza ga tA nan+na dzI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ sgrub thabs 'di nyid dang mthun pa'i bka' lung sngan chad bod du mi snang ba las/ dza ga tA nan+ta'i sras kyi thu bo/ paN+Di ta ma ha bo d+hi las legs par mnos shing / bka' lung mi 'chad par bya ba'i don du/ paN+Di ta'i phyag nas rgya dpe gdan drangs shing / bka' lung don du gnyar ba mang pos kyang gsol ba 'debs pa'i ngor/ gsung rab dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa'i bka' lung man ngag du mas nye bar spras pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa bla ma 'phags pa'i bkas bkul ba la brten nas/ khams gsum gyi bla ma dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo/ chos kyi che/ bod kyi paN+Di ta ma ti d+h+wa dza shrI b+ha dra dang / dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa'i lo tsA ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa dpal ldan smra ba'i seng ges tshig dang don gyi chal legs par dpyad nas/ dpal sa skya'i gtsugs lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur ba'o
483 Q2483 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, 'a251KG13194rgyud 'grel
129a7-141b8 rgyud 'grel, 'a 129a7-141b8 (vol.57, p.219)rgyud 'grel, 'a
129a7-141b8 ye shes dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs dz+nyA ne sh+wa ri sA d+ha nAM jñāneśvarīsādhana 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) smṛtijānakīrti dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa/ dpal ye shes dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa lha yis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta smri ta dz+nyA na kAirtisa sgyur ba'o

521 Q2521 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
1b1-20a4 rgyud 'grel, ya 1b1-20a4 (vol.58, p.1) dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dka' 'grel shrI badzra mri ta pany+tsi kA śrīvajrāmṛitapañjikā dri med bzang po/(vimalabhadra) rin chen grub/(ratnasiddha) spel mar bshad pa dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rdzogs so/ slob dpon drim med bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/ /'di ni sngar gyi 'gyur rnying pa'i le'u gnyis pa man chad ma tshang zhing de yan chad kyang shin tu 'khrugs shing 'grel pa gzhan dang 'dres pa las/ shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis rgya dpe las bsgyur zhing smr-i ti'i spel mar bshad pa dang yang bstun nas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o/ paN+Di ta la ma mnyan zhing /rgya dpe'i dpe dpang ma rnyed la/ saM kr-i ta ma byang bas/ nor na khas pas bcos par zhu'o
522 Q2522 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
20a4-61b2 rgyud 'grel, ya 20a4-61b2 (vol.58, p.10) rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi bshad pa badzrA mri ta tan+t+ra TI kA vajrāmṛititantraṭīkā dri ma med bzang po'i bzang po/(vimalabhadra) smṛtijāna dam pa'i bde ba gnyis med blo yis dngos grub rgyu yi phyir/ mtha' yas rgyud kyi snying po 'di'i 'grel mkhan ni/ gang zhig 'dod pa 'ga' ba sngags kyi mthar gru gyur pa yis/ yon tan rnams la dri ma med pa'i bzang po zhes bya'o/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dz+nyA na nyid kyis bsgyur cing bshad nas gtan la phab pAi rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so
523 Q2523 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
61b2-119b1 rgyud 'grel, ya 61b2-119b1 (vol.58, p.26) dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba shrI badzrA mri ta ma hA tant+t+ra rA dzA s+ya TI kA nA ma śrīvajrāmṛitamahātantrarājasya ṭīkā-nāma b+ha go/(bhagavat) yon tan 'bar/(guṇajvāla) tārapāla rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rgya cher 'grel pa bdud rtsi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon chen po b+ha gos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /gzhung gi tshad ni tshigs su bcad pa stong sum brgya yong ngo/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po tA ra pA la dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba la la chings (chims)yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Di ta shAi la ku dz+ha badz+ra dang / klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bal yul du gtugs te gtan la phab po
524 Q2524 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
119b1-168b2 rgyud 'grel, ya 119b1-168b2 (vol.58, p.50) dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ye shes ldan pa zhes bya ba shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li tan+t+ra pany+dzi ka dz+nyA na pa ti nA ma śrībuddhakapālatantrasya pañjikājñānavatī-nāma saraha zla ba'i 'od zer/(candraprabha) gayadhara sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ye shes ldan pa zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyed pa'i slob dpon chen po sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+hA ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gten la phab pa'o
525 Q2525 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
168b2-186b4 rgyud 'grel, ya 168b2-186b4 (vol.58, p.69) sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel de kho na nyid kyi zla ba zhes bya ba bud+d+ha ka pA la tan+t+ra tat+t+wa pany+dzi tsin+d+ra ka nA ma buddhakapālatantrasya pañjikātattvacandrikā-nāma pad+ma rdo rje/(padmavajra) 'di dag ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po'i le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po pad+ma rdo rje zhes bya ba dngos grub chen po brnyes pas mdzad pa'o
526 Q2526 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
186b5-251b4 rgyud 'grel, ya 186b5-251b4 (vol.58, p.76) dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel zhes bya ba shrI bud+d+ha ka pA lA ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza TI kA b+hA ya badra ti nA ma śrībuddhakapālamahātantrarājaṭīkā-abhayapāddhati-nāma abhayākaragupta blo gros brtan pa/(sthiramati) ces pa dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po'i 'grel pa mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel gnas brtan mkhas pa a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /'di ni sngon lo tsA ba mkhas pa zhig gis bsgyur ba la/ bar skabs su dpe stor bas ma tshang bas las/ dpang lo tsA ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas/ spyi bo lhas pa mkhan po 'jam dpal ser po'i gsung gi bskul te/ le'u dang por der bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po rdo rje zhes pa nas/ 'og gi lam nas byung zhes pa'i bar dang /lha'i sku sgom pa kho na gsungs te/ gang gsungs pa zhes nas brtan pa sa gzhi la sogs pa rnams dang g.yo ba ces pa'i bar dang / le'u gsum pa'i mjug he ru ka'i gzugs su bsgom pa rdzogs pas zhes nas le'u bzhi pa'i tha ma la ni 'dir ma rig pa ste des zhes pa'i bar dang / le'u bcu gsum pa'i dbu'i de kho na nyid ni thams cad la zhes pa nas le'u bcu bzhi pa'i mjug na gang zhig shar bas nizhesa pa'i bar dang / srid gsum rnam rgyal zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis rnams hor kong bas bas shing lhag ma rnams la zhu chen bgyis nas bsgyur ceng gtan la phab pa'o/ 'dis 'gro ba thams cad la phan par shog /'di'i 'gyur snga ma ni lo tsA ba che po deng ri chos grags zhes bya ba yin zhes thos so
527 Q2527 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
251b4-256a3 rgyud 'grel, ya 251b4-256a3 (vol.58, p.102) dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li sA d+ha naM nA ma śrībuddhakapālasādhana-nāma saraha zla ba'i 'od zer/(candraprabha) gayadhara sangs rgyas thod pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyis bsgrubs thabs/ slob dpon chen po sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

271b6-273a3 rgyud 'grel, ya 271b6-273a3 (vol.58, p.110) ri gi A ra li'i sgrub thabs ri gyA ral+li sA d+ha naM rigyāralisādhana rin chen grub/(ratnasiddha) ri gi A ra l+li'i sgrubs thabs rdzogs so/ /shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis rgya dpe ji lta ba bzhin du bsgyur ba'o
531 Q2531 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ya261KG13195rgyud 'grel
273a3-441a6 rgyud 'grel, ya 273a3-441a6 (vol.58, p.111) dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi rgyud kyi don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gi dzA ba la sham+ba ra tan+t+ra rta da roDI kA nA ma śrīsarvabuddhasamayogaḍākinījālaśambaratantrārthaṭīkā-nāma rgyal po brgya byin sdong po/(indraṇāla) lha'i rin po che/(devaratna) vidyākarasiṁha dpal od+yaNa gyi mkhas pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi nyi ma dang 'dra ba/ dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon rgyal po chen po brgya byin sdong pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de lha'i rin po ches bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis phyis legs par gtan la phab pa'o

236a7-246b8 rgyud 'grel, ra 236a7-246b8 (vol.58, p.298) dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs shrI he ru ka sA d+ha na śrīheruka\[-nāma-\]sādhana h'uṁ / (hūṁkāravajra) rin mchog(ratnottara) phyi ma dag(uttaraśubha) vajrahasa dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon che po'i hU~M gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+rasa ha dang / sgra bsgyur lo tsA ba rma rin mchog gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ slad kyi lo tsA ba phyi ma dag gis sum thug tu zhu chen bcos pa'o
548 Q2548 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ra271KG13196rgyud 'grel
246b8-295a1 rgyud 'grel, ra 246b8-295a1 (vol.59, p.1) yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba tsa tu rtaM gar+tha lo ka nA ma caturaṅgārthāloka-nāma h'uṁ mdśad grags pa / (hūṁkārakīrti) rin chen mchog(ratnouttara) do rje bzhad pa/(vajrahasa) yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas shing dngos grub mnyes pa hU~M mdzad grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mnga' bdag gtsan po byang chub sems dpa'i bkas/ dpal bsam yas kyi 'chin phu ru dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon paN+Di ta dpal rdo rje bzhad pa dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po rma rin chen mchog gis dbang sgrub dang bcas par bsgyur cing bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o
549 Q2549 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ra271KG13196rgyud 'grel
295a1-317b5 rgyud 'grel, ra 295a1-317b5 (vol.59, p.20) dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gi maN+Da la sA d+ha na kra ma nA ma śrīsarvabuddha-samayoga-maṇḍala-sādhana-krama-nāma h'uṁ mdśad rdo rje / (hūṁkāravajra) lha rin po che/(devaratna) vidyākarasiṁha dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po hU~M mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra sing+ha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba lha rin po ches bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o
550 Q2550 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ra271KG13196rgyud 'grel
317b5-319a8 rgyud 'grel, ra 317b5-319a8 (vol.59, p.29) dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba saM sid+d+hi ma hA shrI he ru ka no pi ka nA ma saṁsiddhimahāśrīherukopāyikā-nāma vajrahūṁkāra hūṁkāra nam mkha'i snying po/(ākāśagarbha) sgrub pa chen po yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba/ grub pa'i slob dpon chen po badz+ra hU~M ka ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi lha btsan po khri srong lde btsan gyi bka' lung gi dpal na len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po hU~M ka ra de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de snubs nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
551 Q2551 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ra271KG13196rgyud 'grel
319a8-344a1 rgyud 'grel, ra 319a8-344a1 (vol.59, p.30) rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba skyed ma zhes bya ba shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA kI nI dzA la saM ba ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma maN+Da la no pi ka sarba sat+wa su kho ta ya nA ma śrīsarvabuddhasamayogaḍākinījālaśambaramahātantrarāja-nāma-maṇḍalopāyikāsarvasattvasukhodayā-nāma rin chen rdo rje/(ratnavajra) ye shes rdo rje/(jānavajra) bsod/(puṇya) rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba skyed ma zhes bya ba/ kha che'i mkhas pa chen po shes bya mtha' dag la mkhas pa dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ / dpal ldan oD+yana du sbyangs pa/ mkhas pa ye shes rdo rje dang //skad sgyur gnyan ban bsod (bsod nam)de yis/ bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o
4008 Q2552 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ra271KG13196rgyud 'grel
344a1-345a4 rgyud 'grel, ra 344a1-345a4 (vol.59, p.40) rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs badzra sat+wa no pi ka vajrasattvopāyikā indrabhūti rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po rgyal po in+d+ra bu tis mdzad pa rdzogs so
553 Q2553 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ra271KG13196rgyud 'grel
345a4-351b1 rgyud 'grel, ra 345a4-351b1 (vol.59, p.40) bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs b+ha ga bAM shrI ma hA su kha badzra sat+wa sA d+ha naM bhagavacchrīmahāsukhavajrasattvasādhana bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so
554 Q2554 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, ra271KG13196rgyud 'grel
351b1-359a5 rgyud 'grel, ra 351b1-359a5 (vol.59, p.43) dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba shrI badzra sat+wA nu smi ti nA mo bi d+hi śrīvajrasattvānusmṛitividhi-nāma rājahasti dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po thu bo rA dza ha tis mdzad pa rdzogs so
555 Q2555 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
1b1-6b7 rgyud 'grel, la 1b1-6b7 (vol.59, p.47)rgyud 'grel, la
1b1-6b7 sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs tA ra sA d+ha naM tārāsādhana klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) darma rin chen/(dharmaratna) dharmavajra sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ sgrol ma rgya mtsho'i rgyud nas phyung pa 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi maN+Di ta chen po d+harma badz+ra dang / bod kyi rdo lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis bsgyur pa'o/ chos 'khor 'jo 'jo'i gtsug lag khang du dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po chos kyi blo gros kyis yon bdag mdzad po'o
556 Q2556 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
6b7-7b6 rgyud 'grel, la 6b7-7b6 (vol.59, p.50)rgyud 'grel, la
6b7-7b6 thugs rje chen po 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs spyi'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
mahākāruṇikāryatārāsādhanasāmānyābhisamaya-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) thugs rje chen po 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs spyi'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
557 Q2557 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
7b6-12a1 rgyud 'grel, la 7b6-12a1 (vol.59, p.51) lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba tA re de bi sto tAM e ka biM sha ti ka sA d+ha nAM nA ma tārādevīstotra-ekaviṁśatikasādhana-nāma nyi ma sbas pa/(sūryagupta) blo gros grags pa/(matikīrti) majuśrī 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ kha che'i paN+Di ta slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad ma rdzogs so/ /paN+Di many+dzu shrI dang bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
558 Q2558 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
12a1-29a4 rgyud 'grel, la 12a1-29a4 (vol.59, p.53) rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i las kyi yan lag dang bcas pa mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba āryatārābhaṭṭārikāsādhanasakalpaikaviṁśatikakarmasaṁkṣepa-nāma nyi ma sbas pa/(sūryagupta) blo gros grags pa/(matikīrti) majuśrī rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i las kyi yan lag dang bcas pa mdor bsdud pa zhes bya ba/ kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bkri ma shI li'i gtsug lag khang chen po de nyid du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
559 Q2559 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
29a4-30a8 rgyud 'grel, la 29a4-30a8 (vol.59, p.59) sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa tA ra sA d+ha nAM u pa de sha kra ma tārāsādhanopadeśakrama nyi ma sbas pa/ kaśmīr paṇḍita man nag gi sgrub thabs 'di dang po ma 'gyur ba las phyis kha che'i paN+Di tas kha ba can gyi ljongs su spyan drangs pa'i dpe las bod skad du dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur ba'o
560 Q2560 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
30a8-41a7 rgyud 'grel, la 30a8-41a7 (vol.59, p.60) bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs b+ha ga ba ti tA ra de bi e ka biM sha ti sto tra no pi kaM bhagavatītārādevyekaviṁśatistotropāyikā nyi ma sbas pa/(sūryagupta) byams pa'i dpal/(maitrīśrī) śākyaśrībhadra bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgru thabs/ rje btsun lha mo mchog nyid kyis skus rjes su bzung ba'i slob dpon chen po nyi ma'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dpal chos kyi rje ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par grags pa'i paN+Di ta chen po bsod snyoms pa kha che shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bod yul dbus kyi gtsug lag khang chen po sol nag thang po che dang / pho brang dam pa khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o
561 Q2561 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
41a7-45b5 rgyud 'grel, la 41a7-45b5 (vol.59, p.64) lha mo sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig la bstod pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba b+hi de tA re e ka bing+sha ti sto tra bi shud+d+ha tsu Da ma Ni nA ma devītāraikaviṁśatistotra-viśuddhacūḍāmaṇi-nāma sūryagupta kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas rje btsun sgrol ma la bstod pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta sA d+hU kIrti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'dan ma tshul khims seng ges bsgyur ba las/ phyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du dag par byas so
562 Q2562 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
45b5-47a6 rgyud 'grel, la 45b5-47a6 (vol.59, p.66)rgyud 'grel, la
45b5-47a6 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa
āryatārāstotra nyi ma sbas pa/(sūryagupta) tshul khrims seng ge/(śīlasiṁha) sādhukīrti phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa paN+Di ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
563 Q2563 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
47a6-51b7 rgyud 'grel, la 47a6-51b7 (vol.59, p.67) phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa sra ga d+ha ra sto tra sragdharastotra thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen/(sarvajamitra) rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhye na pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rtse gcig tu byed pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka barma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi bsgyur ba las/ slad kyi paN+Di ta che po ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ phyag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis cung zad bcos te dag par byas so
564 Q2564 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
51b7-56a8 rgyud 'grel, la 51b7-56a8 (vol.59, p.68) me tog phreng 'dzin gyi bstod pa sra ga d+ha ra sto traM sragdharastotra thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen/(sarvajamitra) chos rje dpal/(dharmasvāmiśrī) kanakavarman maṇikaśrījāna nyi ma grags/(sūryakīrti) me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta zla ba gzhon nus rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o
565 Q2565 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
56a8-60b3 rgyud 'grel, la 56a8-60b3 (vol.59, p.70) 'phags ma sgrol ma'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa Ar+ya tA ra sra ga d+ha ra stro tra āryatārāsragdharastotra thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen/(sarvajamitra) zla ba gzhon nu/(candrakumāra)
566 Q2566 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
60b3-61b8 rgyud 'grel, la 60b3-61b8 (vol.59, p.72) lha mo sgrol ma la smre sngags kyi gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa de bi tA ra ku bu kya de sha nA ma sto tra devītārākuvākyādhyeṣaṇa-nāma-stotra thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen/(sarvajamitra) byams pa/(maitrī) śākyaśrī paN+Di ta shAkya shrI dang lo tsA ba byams pas bsgyur ba rdzogs so
567 Q2567 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
61b8-62a4 rgyud 'grel, la 61b8-62a4 (vol.59, p.72)rgyud 'grel, la
61b8-62a4 sgrol ma dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa
triratnatārā-stotra dīpaṁkaraśrījāna tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) sgrol ma dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bi ma kra ma shrI la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa rdzogs so
568 Q2568 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
62a4-65a2 rgyud 'grel, la 62a4-65a2 (vol.59, p.73) me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs sra ga d+ha ra sA d+ha naM sragdharasādhana tathāgatarakṣita mya ngan med pa'i dpal/(aśokaśrī) me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlab pa paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga tA rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /cog kru lo tsA ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
569 Q2569 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
65a2-65b6 rgyud 'grel, la 65a2-65b6 (vol.59, p.74) stong pa nyid bsgom pa shU n+ya tA b+ha bA na śūnyatābhāvanā stong pa nyid bsgom pa rdzogs so
570 Q2570 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
65b6-66a7 rgyud 'grel, la 65b6-66a7 (vol.59, p.74) log par blta ba sun dbyung ba ku driSh+Ti dU Sha Na kudṛiṣṭidūṣaṇa lta ba ngan pa sun dbyung pa rdzogs so
571 Q2571 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
66a7-67a3 rgyud 'grel, la 66a7-67a3 (vol.59, p.74) chom rkun bcings pa tso ra ban+d+da corabandha chom rkun bcing ba rdzogs so
572 Q2572 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
67a3-67b6 rgyud 'grel, la 67a3-67b6 (vol.59, p.75) rig pa bskyed pa bi d+yA bar+d+ha ni vidyāvardhana rig pa bskyed pa rdzogs so
573 Q2573 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
67b6-68b2 rgyud 'grel, la 67b6-68b2 (vol.59, p.75) 'chi ba bslu ba mri t+yu ThA ki pa mṛtyuṣṭhāpaka tathāgatarakṣita mya ngan med pa'i dpal/(aśokaśrī) 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/ 'chi ba bslu ba rdzogs so/ cog kru lo tsA ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
574 Q2574 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
68b2-71a8 rgyud 'grel, la 68b2-71a8 (vol.59, p.75) 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bstod pa'i rgyal po Ar+ya tA ra de bi stotra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na nA ma sto tra rA dza āryatārādevīstotrasarvārthasādhana-nāma-stotrarāja mātriciṭa (mātṛceta) 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa don tham cad grub pa zhes bya ba bstod pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so/ /slob dpon mA tri tsi Tasa bstod pa'o
575 Q2575 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
71a8-72b7 rgyud 'grel, la 71a8-72b7 (vol.59, p.76) 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pas rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs Ar+yA mA yA dzA la kra min pa tA re ga sA d+ha na āryamāyājālakrameṇa bhaṭṭārikātārāsādhana gzhon nu 'od/(kumāraprabha) mahājana 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pas rje btsun ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA M.dza na dang / lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o
576 Q2576 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
72b7-74b6 rgyud 'grel, la 72b7-74b6 (vol.59, p.77) 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs cho ga zhes bya ba Ar+ya tA re maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma sA d+ha nAM āryatārāmaṇḍalasādhanavidhi-nāma lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa/(sahajalalita) 'brog mi lo tsA ba rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i lha bcu'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /'brog mi lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o
577 Q2577 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
74b6-79a6 rgyud 'grel, la 74b6-79a6 (vol.59, p.78) 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba Ar+ya bi ThI sh+wa ri sA d+d+ha nAM nA Ma āryapīṭhīśvarīsādhana-nāma 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje/(majuśrīlīlāvajra) saṁgamaśrībhadra 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas phyung ba rdzogs so/ /thugs rje chen pos dbang lan gsum bskur ba'i grub thob wa ni ta b+ha dra'i slob ma saM g+ha ma shrI b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o/ rdo rje ldan ma/ paN+Di ta pa ra he / wa ni ta b+ha dra/ saM g+ha ma shrI b+ha dra/ 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje mkhas pa sa phug pa
578 Q2578 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
79a6-81a2 rgyud 'grel, la 79a6-81a2 (vol.59, p.79) dpal u r+yan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba shrI oD+D+ya na tA ra kra ma a b+hi sa ma ya nA ma śrīuḍḍiyānatārābhisamayakrama-nāma 'jams dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje/(majuśrīlīlāvajra) saṁgamaśrībhadra bcom ldan 'das ma o rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa rdzogs so// thugs rje chen pos dbang lan gsum bskur ba'i sgrub thob wa ni ta b+ha dra'i slob ma paN+Di ta saM g+ha ma shrI b+ha dra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o
579 Q2579 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
81a2-81b2 rgyud 'grel, la 81a2-81b2 (vol.59, p.80) u rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa oM d+ya na tA ra kra ma uḍḍiyānatārākrama 'jams dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje/(majuśrīlīlāvajra) saṁgamaśrībhadra o rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta saM g+ha ma shrI dang / lo tsA ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o
580 Q2580 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
81b2-83b3 rgyud 'grel, la 81b2-83b3 (vol.59, p.80) dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga maN+Da la a b+hi She ka ta bi d+hi maṇḍalābhiṣekavidhi parahita 'jams dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje/(majuśrīlīlāvajra) saṁgamaśrībhadra dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bsdus pa/ pa ra he ta paN+Di tas sbyar ba rdzogs so/ kha che'i paN+Di ta saM g+ha ma shrI b+ha dra dang / 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjel bsgyur ba'o
581 Q2581 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
83b3-84b2 rgyud 'grel, la 83b3-84b2 (vol.59, p.81) dpa' mo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba e ka bI ra yo gI sA d+ha naM nA ma ekavīrayoginīsādhana-nāma parahita shes rab rgyal mtshan/(prajādhvaja) dpa' mo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
582 Q2582 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
84b2-88a4 rgyud 'grel, la 84b2-88a4 (vol.59, p.82) u rgyan gyi rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba oM D+ya na gra ma tA re de bi sA d+ha nAM nA ma uḍḍiyānakramatārādevīsādhana-nāma mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan ma/(vajravatī ḍākinī) parahita shes rab rgyal mtshan/(prajādhvaja) mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas gsungs pa'o/ ma hA A tsaR+Ya rat+na shrI'i slob ma paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lo tsA ba nga tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
583 Q2583 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
88a4-88b5 rgyud 'grel, la 88a4-88b5 (vol.59, p.83) gtor ma'i cho ga nyung ngu ba liM a lpu bi d+hi balyalpavidhi gtor ma'i cho ga nyung ngu zhes bya ba rdzogs so
584 Q2584 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
88b5-91a5 rgyud 'grel, la 88b5-91a5 (vol.59, p.83) zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i mchod pa'i rim pa pi thi sh+wa ra pu dza kra ma piṭhīśvarīpūjākrama parahita shes rab rgyal mtshan/(prajādhvaja) zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lota tsA ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
585 Q2585 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
91a5-92b3 rgyud 'grel, la 91a5-92b3 (vol.59, p.84) de kho na nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa tat+t+wa kA ri kA tattvakārikā tshul khrims rgyal mtshan/(śīladhvaja) parahita de kho na nyid kyis man ngag rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
586 Q2586 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
92b3-98a8 rgyud 'grel, la 92b3-98a8 (vol.59, p.85) de kho na nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i man ngag gi 'grel pa zhes bya ba tat+t+wakA ri kA u pa de sha br-it+ti nA maH tattvakārikopadeśavṛitti-nāma sujayaśrībhadra parahita shes rab rgyal mtshan/(prajādhvaja) rin chen dpal/(ratnaśrī) de kho na nyid 'di zhes pa la sogs pa legs par go ba rdzogs so/ /de kho na nyid kyi man ngag mkhas pa chen po slob dpon su dza ya shrI b+ha dra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/ rgya gar gyi mkhas pa rin chen dpal gyi zhabs la gtugs pa/ paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lo tsA ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
587 Q2587 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
98b1-99a3 rgyud 'grel, la 98b1-99a3 (vol.59, p.87) gnas chen gyi rim pa'i lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa pi thi kra ma tA da bi sto traM pīṭhīkramatārādevīstotra mi bskyod rdo rje/(akṣobhyavajra) tshul khrims rgyal mtshan/(śīladhvaja) parahita gnas chen gyi lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
588 Q2588 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
99a3-101a8 rgyud 'grel, la 99a3-101a8 (vol.59, p.87) zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa pi thi sh+wa ra sto tra pīṭhīśvarī-stotra blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba/(mantrikulasurata) ye shes rdo rje/(jānavajra) nag tsho chen po zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa 'di blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba'i paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta ye shes rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba nag tsho chen pos bsgyur ba'o
589 Q2589 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
101a8-102b4 rgyud 'grel, la 101a8-102b4 (vol.59, p.87) rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba badzra g+haN+Da la k+Sha Na nA ma vajraghaṇṭalakṣaṇa-nāma parahita shes rab rgyal mtshan/(prajādhvaja) rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// paN+Di ta pa ra he dang nga / lo tsA ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
590 Q2590 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
102b4-103a7 rgyud 'grel, la 102b4-103a7 (vol.59, p.89) thod pa mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba ka bA la pU dza bi d+hi nA ma kapālapūjāvidhi-nāma thod pa mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so
591 Q2591 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
103a7-104b5 rgyud 'grel, la 103a7-104b5 (vol.59, p.89) rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs s+wap+na tA ra no pi ka svapnatāropāyikā zla ba'i bshes gnyen/(candramitra) byams pa'i dpal/(maitrīśrī) sugataśrī rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon zla ba'i bshes gnyan gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta su ga ta shrI dang lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
592 Q2592 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
104b5-105a4 rgyud 'grel, la 104b5-105a4 (vol.59, p.90) rje btsun Arya tA ra'i man ngag la brten nas 'chi ka ma'i nyams len
āryatārābhaṭṭārikopadeśāśrayāsannamaraṇāmnāya byams pa'i dpal/(maitrīśrī) śākyaśrībhadra rje btsun AR+Ya tA ra'i man ngag la brten nas 'chi ka'i ma'i nyams len/ dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i kha che shAkya shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
593 Q2593 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
105a4-106a2 rgyud 'grel, la 105a4-106a2 (vol.59, p.90) 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba Ar+ya tA ra sa d+ha nA ma āryatārāsādhana-nāma thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen/(sarvajamitra) rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
594 Q2594 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
106a2-106b5 rgyud 'grel, la 106a2-106b5 (vol.59, p.90) 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs Ar+ya tA ra s+wa d+ha nAM āryatārāsādhana śākyaśrībhadra 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas byung ba rdzogs so
595 Q2595 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
106b5-107a5 rgyud 'grel, la 106b5-107a5 (vol.59, p.90)rgyud 'grel, la
106b5-107a5 rdo rje phag mo sgrol ma la bstod pa badzra bA ra hi tA ra sto traM vajravārāhītārāstotra zla ba grags pa/(candrakīrti) dur khrod brgyad kyi zhing khams su/ rdo rje phag mor skur bston cing / me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs/ sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ paN+Di ta zla ba grags pas bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so
596 Q2596 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
107a5-107b2 rgyud 'grel, la 107a5-107b2 (vol.59, p.91) sgrol ma khro mo la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bstod pa ut+tA ra sto tra nA ma ugratārāmūlamantrastotra-nāma dpal ral pa gcig ma'i rtsa ba'i sngags don 'gyur du bsgyur pa'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so
597 Q2597 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
107b2-109a2 rgyud 'grel, la 107b2-109a2 (vol.59, p.91) lha mo u gra tA ra'i sgrub thabs u gra tA ra de wI sA d+ha naM ugratārādevīsādhana śrīvanaratna 'jam dpal ye shes/(manjuśrījāna) śrīvanaratna lha mo u gra tA ra'i sgrub thabs rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta de nyid dang chos 'khor lo tsA ba 'jam dpal ye shes zhes bya bas dpal 'khor bde chen du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o
598 Q2598 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
109a2-110a5 rgyud 'grel, la 109a2-110a5 (vol.59, p.91) 'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba Ar+ya u gra tA ra sA d+ha nAM nA ma āryogratārāsādhana-nāma rtag pa'i rdo rje/(śāśvatavajra) majuśrī śrīvanaratna 'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba many+dzu shris slad nas bsgyur ba dge'o
599 Q2599 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
110a5-111b1 rgyud 'grel, la 110a5-111b1 (vol.59, p.92) ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs e ka dzA Ti s+wa d+ha nAM ekajaṭīsādhana rtag pa'i rdo rje/(śāśvatavajra) dānaśīla 'di ni blo gros rab bsgrub ma/ rtag pa'i rdo rjes byas pa yin/ mkhas pa chen po paN+Di tas/ 'di la shin tu bzod par 'os/ rgya nag las ni byung ba yi/ sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs yongs su rdzogs/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las 'on 'di'i sku grong du lha'i skad las bod kyi brda' la 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba'o
600 Q2600 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
111b1-111b4 rgyud 'grel, la 111b1-111b4 (vol.59, p.92) sgrol ma khros pa'i ba ling gi gtor ma
krodhatārābalyupahāra dānaśīla sgrol ma khros mo'i ba ling gi gtor ma rdzogs so/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na shI las/_'gren gyi khyad gsar du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o
601 Q2601 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
111b4-113a1 rgyud 'grel, la 111b4-113a1 (vol.59, p.92) sgrol ma ral gcig ma'i blo 'phel
ekajaṭītārāmativardhana rtag pa rdo rje/(śāśvatavajra) dānaśīla sgrol ma'i blo 'phel slob dpon klu sgrub kyi man ngag mkhan rtag pa rdo rjes tshig le'ur byas pa/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI la'i gsung lhag chad med par bkod pa rdzogs so
602 Q2602 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
113a1-114b6 rgyud 'grel, la 113a1-114b6 (vol.59, p.93) ral gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs shu kla e ka dzA sA d+ha naM śuklaikajaṭīsādhana rol pa'i sbas pa/(lalitagupta) dānaśīla bcom ldan 'das ma ral pa gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/_dpal gnyis med rdo rje las byung ba slob dpon rol pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren+d+ra dzI ga tA la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las yul kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ba'o
603 Q2603 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
114b6-115b5 rgyud 'grel, la 114b6-115b5 (vol.59, p.94) ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs rak+ta e ka dzA Ti sba d+ha nAM raktaikajaṭīsādhana mi dbang bzang po/(narendrabhadra) legs pa'i blo gros/(sādhumati) rgya gar shar phyogs paN+Di ta/_mi dbang bzang po'i zhal snga dang /_dam chos smra ba'i btsun pa ni/_legs pa'i blo gros bdag gis bsgyur
604 Q2604 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
115b5-116b4 rgyud 'grel, la 115b5-116b4 (vol.59, p.94) ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i byin brlabs kyi cho ga e ka dzA Ti a d+hiSh+ThA na bi d+hi raktaikajaṭyadhiṣṭhānavidhi ngag po spyod pa ba/(kānhapāda) gzhon nu shes rab/(kumārapraja) mi dbang bzang po/(narendrabhadra) ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i byin brlabs kyi cho ga nag po spyod pa bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta mi dbang bzang po dang / lo tsA ba gzhon nu shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
605 Q2605 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
116b4-119a3 rgyud 'grel, la 116b4-119a3 (vol.59, p.94) mchog gi sgrol ma ral pa gcig pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs ai ka dzA TI u pa de sha sA d+ha naM agratāraikajaṭyupadeśasādhana b+hagu pa/ dānaśīla rnal 'byor pa/(yogin) mchog gi sgrol ma ral pa gcig pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi/_bdag nyid chen po klu sgrub kyi mchog gi rim pa/_tshe'i dngos grub mnyes pa/_'chi med go cha las brgyud pa/_snyan ngag mkhan po rtag pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag_/lnga rig lkog du gyur pa b+ha gu pa paN+Di ta'i khyad chos/_rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN chen dA na shI la las/_shAkya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa khu rnal 'byor pa las/_'on d+har sang skr-i ta'i skad las rang 'gyur du gsungs so
606 Q2606 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
119a3-121b4 rgyud 'grel, la 119a3-121b4 (vol.59, p.95) sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrub thabs tA ra de ba pany+tsa sA d+ha naM tārādevapañcasādhana rtag pa'i rdo rje/(śāśvatavajra) chos 'bar/(dharmajvāla) ratnadhati sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba/_slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rat+na d+ha ti dang/_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o
607 Q2607 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
121b4-122a3 rgyud 'grel, la 121b4-122a3 (vol.59, p.96) dus mtshams srang mda'i las
saṁdhyātulākoṭīkarman lhuśori dus mtshams srang mda'i las/_/gu ru lhu sho ris mdzad pa'o
608 Q2608 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
122a3-123b1 rgyud 'grel, la 122a3-123b1 (vol.59, p.97) thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba kA ru Na tA ra sA d+ha naM karuṇatārāsādhana-nāma śāśvatavajra don yod rdo rje/(amoghavajra) ba ri thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dngos grub phreng ba zhes bya ba/_slob dpon rtag pa badzra mdzad pa rdzogs so/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa ba ris rgya dpe bod du spyan drangs nas/_ba spug rong gi gser khang du bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o
609 Q2609 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
123b1-124a6 rgyud 'grel, la 123b1-124a6 (vol.59, p.97) rje btsun sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga
tārābhaṭṭārikāntarabalividhi candragomi rje btsun sgrol ma'i nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /yul bla po rdzong du bsgyur ba lags gsung ngo
610 Q2610 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
124a6-124b5 rgyud 'grel, la 124a6-124b5 (vol.59, p.97) phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ta li sa ti tsakra pṛiṣṭhyacakra rtag pa'i rdo rje/(śāśvatavajra) chos 'bar/(dharmajvāla) phyir bzlog 'khor lo slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/mkhas pa chen po rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o
611 Q2611 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
124b5-125a8 rgyud 'grel, la 124b5-125a8 (vol.59, p.98) sgrol ma'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs tA ra gu h+yaH sA d+ha naM tārāguhyasādhana rtag pa'i rdo rje/(śāśvatavajra) ratnadhara rma sgrol ma gsang ba'i sgrubs thabs/_dpal rtag pa'i rdo rje lung bstan pas bkod pa/_gsang ba za ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na d+ha ra dang /_lo tsA ba rmas bsgyur ba'o
612 Q2612 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
125a8-126b1 rgyud 'grel, la 125a8-126b1 (vol.59, p.98) thugs rje sgrol ma las sna tshogs pa'i sgrub thabs kA ru Na s+wa d+ha naM karma bi sh+wa karuṇatārāviśvakarmasādhana śāśvatavajra ba ri rgya gar bsil ba'i sang ldeng phug du slob dpon rtag pa'i badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa chen po ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o
613 Q2613 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
126b1-126b5 rgyud 'grel, la 126b1-126b5 (vol.59, p.98) khwa gdong ma srang mda' nag mo zhes bye ba
kākāsyatulākoṭīkālī-nāma śāśvatavajra khwa yi gdong pa srang mda' nag mo zhes bya ba/_slob dpon rtag pa'i badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so
614 Q2614 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
126b6-130a5 rgyud 'grel, la 126b6-130a5 (vol.59, p.98) rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i man ngag me long dwangs pa zhes bya ba
ādarśaprasāda-nāma-tārābhaṭṭārikopadeśa śāśvatavajra dharmakīrti ba ri/ gus ston/ rma rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i man ngag me long dwangs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/bems po'i sna rtse dang 'od kyi dang /_dran pa'i drang /_dus kyi dang /_dbyibs kyi dang /_myong ba'i sna rtse'o/_rtag pa'i badzra nas brgyud pa'i dngos grub brtan gzigs kyi rgyud bskor 'di/_rma dang ba ri gnyis kyi lugs/_d+har+m+ma kIrti zhes bya bas/_bca' dang bla ma gus ston la/_zhus pa rin chen lta bu 'di/_sgrol ma'i zhabs la gtugs par smon
615 Q2615 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
130a5-132a4 rgyud 'grel, la 130a5-132a4 (vol.59, p.100) dpal u rgyan gyi rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba se dan+ta shrI ye yo ga ni rma sh+ma shA na kalpa nA ma uḍḍiyānaśrīyogayoginīsvayambhūsambhogaśmaśānakalpa-nāma virūpa prajāśrījānakīrti dpal dbu rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang /_rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon bir ba pas mdzad pa las btus pa/_rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o
616 Q2616 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
132a4-135a3 rgyud 'grel, la 132a4-135a3 (vol.59, p.101) rjes chags kyi sbyor bas de kho na nyid rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag ces bya ba
anukampopakramatattvayogāvatāropadeśa-nāma don yod rdo rje/(amoghavajra) paN+Di ta chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ rjes chags kyi sbyor bas de kho na'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag ces bya ba rdzogs so
617 Q2617 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
135a3-137a1 rgyud 'grel, la 135a3-137a1 (vol.59, p.102) las kyi phyag rgya brtag pa'i man ngag ces bya ba karma mu dra pa ri k+Sha u pa de shA nA ma karmamudrāparīkṣopadeśa-nāma amoghavajra amoghavajra lhas btsas/(devasūta) las kyi phyag rgya brtag pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/_paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzra las byung ba rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba mgos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o

137a1-138a6 rgyud 'grel, la 137a1-138a6 (vol.59, p.103) dbang chos rten 'brel 'gro ldog d+harma a b+hi She ka marga sa hi dharmābhiṣekamārgasaṁhati nāḍapāda chos 'bar/(dharmajvāla) te phu ba/(pārāvatapāda) dpal nA ro pas mdzad pa'i dbang chos kyi gdams ngag rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi bla ma te phu ba dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

157b5-168a3 rgyud 'grel, la 157b5-168a3 (vol.59, p.111) pad+ma dra ba 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs pad+ma dzA lod+b+ha ba sA d+ha ni padmajālodbhavasādhana rgyal ba dpal ye shes/(jayaśrījāna) rin chen grub/(ratnasiddha) sumanaśrī ces pa pad+ma dra ba dpal 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba dpal ye shes kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /kha che'i paN+Di ta su ma na shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
623 Q2623 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, la281KG13197rgyud 'grel
168a3-183a7 rgyud 'grel, la 168a3-183a7 (vol.59, p.115) pad+ma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma dra ba'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i cho ga pad+ma a ba lo gi te sh+wa ra s+ya pad+ma dzA la kra me Na b+ha ga ba te maN+Da la pU dzA bi d+hi padmāvalokiteśvarasya padmajālakrameṇa bhagavanmaṇḍalapūjāvidhi rgyal ba dpal ye shes/(jayaśrījāna) rin chen grub/(ratnasiddha) sumanaḥśrībhadra pad+ma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma dra ba'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/_/rgyal ba dpal ye shes ming gzhan pad+ma rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po su ma naHshrI b+ha dra dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

178a2-182b3 rgyud 'grel, gi 178a2-182b3 (vol.62, p.23) rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa badzra sat+wa sA d+ha naM ni baM d+ha vajrasattvasādhana-nibandha līlāvajra rin chen grub/(ratnasiddha) rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so/_/lI la badzra zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/_/bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ra'i rgya dpe la bltas nas/_dge slong rin chen grub kyis/_dpa' bo'i lo smin drug can gyi zla ba'i tshes nyer bzhi la bsgyur ba'o/_/yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no/_/sngags kyi nges pa thog ma ste/_gnyis la dgod pa bstan pa'o/_rnam par bzhag pa yang gsum ste/_bzhi pa de nyid bstan pa'o/_zhes pa sgrub thabs kyi go rim ste/_'di'i don ni dang por sngags kyi tshig sgrub thabs las phyung nas sems kyi kun tu brtags pa nges par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phung po la sogs pa rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnam pas dgod pa'o/_bkod pa'i lha rnams re re'i mthar gyis rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su shes shing nges par rtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo'o/_zhes pa ni rnam par bzhag pa'o/_phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi gcig tu byas nas rab tu zhugs te gnas pa las langs te/_nges par byung ba'i sngags las dgod par 'gyur ro zhes so

1b1-162b1 rgyud 'grel, chi 1b1-162b1 (vol.63, p.169) rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa rat+na par+shA nA ma ra ha s+ya sa ma dzA brit+ti ratnavṛkṣa-nāma-rahasyasamājavṛtti celuka ye shes rgyal mtshan/(jānadhvaja) kamalagupta rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud 'grel pa chen po/_rin po che ljon shing zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po tse lu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang /_bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po/_mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

378a3-381b8 rgyud 'grel, pi 378a3-381b8 (vol.67, p.189) shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba su ni pra pany+tsa tat+to pa de sha nA ma suniṣprapañcatattvopadeśa-nāma virūpa darpaṇācārya shes rab rin chen/(prajāratna) shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon dpal ldan mthu stobs kyis mgon po thugs spros pa med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du/_/sku'i spros pa dpag tu med pas gdug pa can tshar gcod cing /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po barbi pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/bstan pa bsrung pa'i lha rnams kyis bu gcig pa ltar bskyangs pas rgyal po gzhan gyi phyir rgol bas glags lta bar ma nus pa'i ljongs chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi ma gzugs su/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa dpal d+harba Na A tsAR+ya dang /_/glo bo lo tsA dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

217b7-221a4 rgyud 'grel, phi 217b7-221a4 (vol.68, p.16) rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrubs kyi snang ba zhes bya ba ku la lo ka nA tha sA d+ha nA li ka nA ma kulalokanāthasādhanālokakāma mahiman dharmadhara yar lungs grags pa rgyal mtshan/(kīrtidhvaja) dpal ldan rje btsun rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi snang ba rje btsun ma hi mas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA d+ha ra dang / yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o

221a4-238a6 rgyud 'grel, phi 221a4-238a6 (vol.68, p.17) lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa pany+tsa sha kA Ti pi ni paṇcāśikāṭippaṇī dri med dpal bzang po/(vimalaśrībhadra) yar lungs grags pa rgyal mtshan/(kīrtidhvaja) mi chen lha rje me ga ling 'di ni rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa mdor bsdus pa ste/ kha che'i paN+Di ta dri med dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du mi chen lha rje me ga ling gis zhus shing / yar lungs ba shud kyi grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o
985 Q2986 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, phi461KG13215rgyud 'grel
238a6-239b4 rgyud 'grel, phi 238a6-239b4 (vol.68, p.24) rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa
kulalokeśvarabhāvanākrama vimalaśrī
986 Q2987 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, phi461KG13215rgyud 'grel
239b4-240a7 rgyud 'grel, phi 239b4-240a7 (vol.68, p.24) rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa
anujñaptikriyākrama vimalaśrī blo brtan/(sthiramati) ku la lo ka nA tha'i byin brlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la shrI'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa'i/ /ma rig pa yi rim pa las/ /dbang bskur byed pa'i rim pa yis/ /ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes rdo rje phreng ba las gsung pas/ /ma rig pa lnga bsal nas rig pa ye shes lnga rtogs par byed pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo / lo tsA ba blo brtan gyis bsgyur ba'o
987 Q2988 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, phi461KG13215rgyud 'grel
240a7-241b8 rgyud 'grel, phi 240a7-241b8 (vol.68, p.25) rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs ku la lo ki sh+wa ra sA d+hA nAM kulalokeśvarasādhana bhriṁgira 'jam dpal sgeg pa/(majuśrīlīla) rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs/_/slob dpon b+g+riM gi ra bram zes mdzad pa 'jam dpal sgeg pas bsgyur ba rdzogs so
988 Q2989 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, phi461KG13215rgyud 'grel

989 Q2990 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, phi461KG13215rgyud 'grel

247b3-257b6 rgyud 'grel, phi 247b3-257b6 (vol.68, p.28) bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba b+ha ga ba t+ya pa ri tA yur+dz+nyA na maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma bhagavadaparimitāyurjñānamaṇḍalavidhi-nāma ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mo/(jānaḍākinī siddharājī) bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dbang bzhi bskur ba'i cho ga'i las khrigs 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum pa zhes bya ba/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

257b6-261a8 rgyud 'grel, phi 257b6-261a8 (vol.68, p.32) tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs a pa ri mi tA yur+dz+nyA na sA d+ha na ma aparimitāyurjñāna-nāma-sādhana zla ba bzang po/(candrabhadra) glan darma tshul khrims/(dharmaśīla) rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o

271a6-284a5 rgyud 'grel, phi 271a6-284a5 (vol.68, p.37) 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa Ar+ya nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ru tra bi ti tan+t+ra br-I ti nA ma āryanīlāmbaradharavajrapāṇirudratrivinītanāmatantravṛtti ajapālipāda devapūrṇamati chos kyi bzang po/(dharmabhadra) drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa bdud rtsi myu gu zhes bya ba/_dngos grub brnyes pa'i dza ba ri pas sa ba ri ba la man ngag tu zhasu pa rdzogs so/_/paN+Di ta de ba pu N+ya ma ti dang /_lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgrur ba'o

231a5-295b1 rgyud 'grel, mi 231a5-295b1 (vol.69, p.13) mi zad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba gnyug ma'i de nyid rab tu ston pa'i rgya cher bshad pa do ha ni d+hi ko Sha gI ti nAM pa ri pu ra pa shastra mi na ti yo TI kA dohanidhikoṣaparipūrṇagīti-nāma-nijatattvaprakāśatīkā gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje/(advayavajra) prajāśrījānakīrti mi bzad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyung chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i dgongs pa mkhas par grags pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrIdz+nyA na kIr+t+tis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

147a4-147b1 rgyud 'grel, tsi 147a4-147b1 (vol.69, p.131) tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa zhes bya ba pany+tsa sarga nA ma pañcasarga-nāma nag po/(kṛṣṇa) vairocanavajra brtul zhugs spyod pa'i slob dpon chen po nag pos mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so/_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shrI bai ro tsa na badzras bsgyur ba'o

147b1-149a1 rgyud 'grel, tsi 147b1-149a1 (vol.69, p.131) do ha mdzod do ha ko Sha dohakoṣa tailikapāda rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje/(vairocanavajra) slob dpon chen po tai lo pas mdzad pa'i do ha mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so/_/rgya gar lho phyogs ko sA lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po mkhas pa dpal rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du gsungs pa'o

149a1-150a4 rgyud 'grel, tsi 149a1-150a4 (vol.69, p.131) dpal birba pa'i tshigs rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa shrI bi rU pa tsa a ra si śrīvirūpapadacaturaśīti virūpa vairocanavajra rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal birba pas mdzad pa'i tshigs rkang brgyad cu pa rdzogs so/ /yul lho phyogs ko sA lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badz+ra'i zhal snga rang 'gyur du mdzad nas gsungs pa'o

150a4-152a8 rgyud 'grel, tsi 150a4-152a8 (vol.69, p.132) do ha mdzod ces bya ba do ha ko Sha nA ma dohakoṣa-nāma virūpa vairocana do ha mdzod ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang pyug birba pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI bai ro tsa nas rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o/_brgyud pa ni birba pa/_nag po ba/_slob dpon sgra mkhan zhabs/_slob dpon pu ra pa/_shrI bai ro tsa na'o

82a5-84b8 rgyud 'grel, tshi 82a5-84b8 (vol.69, p.223) mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba badzra DA ki ni gI ta nA ma vajraḍākinīgīti-nāma dbyings kyi gtso mo/rje dam pa rgya gar/ zha ma mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga zhes bya ba/_gsang mdzod na shog dril du gnas pa las/_dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/_rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang /_slad kyis ding ri bla 'khor du zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur nas/_bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad pa yin no/_khyad par gyi brgyud pa chen po brgyad las/_brda skor rnam pa bzhi rdzogs so

104a1-104b4 rgyud 'grel, tshi 104a1-104b4 (vol.69, p.231) sems kyi gsang ba zab don brda'i glur blangs pa zhes bya ba tsit+ta gu h+ya gam+b+hi rA tha gI ta nA ma cittaguhyagambhīrārthagīti-nāma śābarīśvara dam pa/ zha ma zab mo brda'i glu gsang ba'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /sha ba ri dbang phyug gis dam pa la gsungs pa/ dam pa'i zhal snga nas zha ma lo tsA bas gtan la phab ste/ dpal ding ri mkhan pa'i khrod du bsgyur ba'o

vajragītibhāvanopadeśatilakakanakamālā-nāma grub pa thob pa bzhi bcu/(catvāriṁśatsiddha) dpal o Ti ya nar tshogs 'khor byas pa'i dus su/_rnal 'byor pa grub pa thob pa bzhi bcus rdo rje'i mgur bzhengs pa/_nyams kyi man ngag_/thig le gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so

1279 Q3280 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tshi501KG13219rgyud 'grel
113b4-116b1 rgyud 'grel, tshi 113b4-116b1 (vol.69, p.235) phyag rgya chen po rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ma hA mu drA rat+na gI ta tsakra nA ma mahāmudrāratnābhiṣekacakra-nāma du khrod rgyu skal dpal gyi rol pa/(śmaśānadhiṣṇya śrīlalita) rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo gsal ba zhes bya ba/_dur khrod rgyu skar dpal gyi rol par gsungs pa rdzogs so
1280 Q3281 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tshi501KG13219rgyud 'grel
116b2-145b6 rgyud 'grel, tshi 116b2-145b6 (vol.69, p.236) rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur yo ga sarba tat+t+A/ u mu tri A lo ka nA ma bi ka la badzra gI ta sarvayogatattvāloka-nāma-sakalasiddhavajragīti rgyal sras mi'i seng ge/(rājaputranṛsiṁha) rgyal sras mi'i seng ge rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che/(rājaputranṛsiṁhaparamasvāmin) rgyal sras mi'i seng+ge rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che'i zhal snga nas/_rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/_phyag rgya chen po dum bu khrigs/_tshig tu nyung la don du 'gril/_/nyams myong skyes pa rdo rje'i mgur/_ma rig mun sel sgron me 'di/_skal ldan mig gi dbang po yis/_lta bas mi ngoms blos mi 'khrud/_sgro 'dogs glags pa tsam gyis chos/_e ma ngo re mtshar rdzogs so
1281 Q3282 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tshi501KG13219rgyud 'grel
145b6-156a7 rgyud 'grel, tshi 145b6-156a7 (vol.69, p.248) phyag rgya chen po gser phreng zhes bya ba ma hA mu dra ka na ka mA le nA ma mahāmudrākanakamālā-nāma maitrīpapāda mar pa chos kyi blo gros/(darmamati) maitri pa/(maitrīpāda) phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu/_rin po che gser phreng zhes bya ba/_grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba dang/_paN+Di ta mang pos gsungs pa rnams/_rje btsun mnga' bdag mai tri pas/_gzhung gcig tu bsdebs pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so/_/paN+Di ta de nyid dang/_lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o

156a7-161a8 rgyud 'grel, tshi 156a7-161a8 (vol.69, p.252) shes rab kyi phrin yig ces bya ba pradz+nyA le kha nA ma prajñālekha-nāma padmavajra 'gos lhas btsas/(devasūta) śāntabhadra she rab kyi 'phrin yig slob dpon chen po pad+ma rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

168a3-169a2 rgyud 'grel, tshi 168a3-169a2 (vol.69, p.257) shes rab brtsams pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba pradz+nyA tat k+shaM b+ho shi pA ri ka thA nA ma prajñārambhāvadhiparikathā-nāma gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje/(advayavajra) shes rab brtsams pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba/_bang+ga la'i mkhas pa dpal nges par sbyangs pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes bram ze b+ha lo la gdams pa rdzogs so

169a2-169b5 ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u sa mA d+hi saM b+ha ra pa ra barta samādhisambhāraparivarta mar me mdzad ye shes/(dīpaṁkarajāna) mar me mdzad ye shes/(dīpaṁkarajāna) shAkya blo gros/(śakyamati) ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u/_slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

169b5-170a8 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga lo ka a ti ta sap+ta ki b+ha d+hi lokātītasaptāṅgavidhi mar me mdzad ye shes/(dīpaṁkarajāna) mar me mdzad ye shes/(dīpaṁkarajāna) shAkya blo gros/(śakyamati) 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis/_dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ro
1289 Q3290 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tshi501KG13219rgyud 'grel
170a8-173b4 rgyud 'grel, tshi 170a8-173b4 (vol.69, p.258) bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba su ga ta shA sa na rat+na b+hi hi da dra nA ma sugataśāsanaratnavohittha-nāma ajitamitragupta buddhaśrījāna jaganmitrānanda byams pa dpal/(maitrīśrī) bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba/_grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a dzi ta mi tra gup+tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/paN+Di ta dza ga ta mi a nan+da dang bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba byams pa dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

173b4-176b4 rgyud 'grel, tshi 173b4-176b4 (vol.69, p.259) dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos shrI abn+d+ha mu mu ka ta shAstra śrībandhavimukta-śāstra niṣkalaṅka buddhaśrībhadra gnubs tshul khrims shes rab/(śīlaprajā) dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos/_rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po grub pa brnyes pa'i dpal ni ska lang+kas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi trA nAn+da'i zhal snga nas/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI b+ha dras gtan la phab nas/_bod kyi lo chung gnubs tshul khrims shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o

176b4-176b8 rgyud 'grel, tshi 176b4-176b8 (vol.69, p.260) lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba bi shu d+d+ha dar+sha na tsar+ya u pa de sha nA ma viśuddhadarśanacaryopadeśa-nāma śākyaśrībhadra byams pa'i dpal/(maitrīśrī) lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dpal chos kyi rje shAkya shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis khro phu bzang lung du bsgyur ba'o
1292 Q3293 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, tshi501KG13219rgyud 'grel
176b8-177a5 rgyud 'grel, tshi 176b8-177a5 (vol.69, p.260) sems rin po che sbyang ba'i lam 'bras tsit+ta rat+na bi sho d+hA nAM marga laM citta-ratnaviśodhanamārgaphala buddhaśrījāna byams pa'i dpal/(maitrīśrī) kha che'i rigs las bal yul du sku 'khrungs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal lnga rig pa'i mchog bud d+ha shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/_sems rin po che sbyang ba'i lam 'bras zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul yaM 'gal gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o

177a5-177b1 rgyud 'grel, tshi 177a5-177b1 (vol.69, p.261) 'ching ba rnam grol gyi man ngag ces bya ba ban+d+hA bi mukto pa de sha nA ma bandhavimuktopadeśa-nāma jaganmitrānanda byams pa'i dpal/(maitrīśrī) 'ching ba rnam grol gyi man ngag ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shrI dza ga ta mi tra a nan+da'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul gu lang gser khang du bsgyur ba'o

180a5-180b7 rgyud 'grel, tshi 180a5-180b7 (vol.69, p.262) pha rol dbang du bya ba b+ha ra wa sha mA na paravaśīkaraṇa gnubs pha rol dbang du bya ba gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

180b8-193b4 rgyud 'grel, tshi 180b8-193b4 (vol.69, p.262) rin po che 'khor lo'i dbang gi man ngag gi rim pa rat+na tsakra a b+hi She ka u pa de sha kra ma ratnacakrābhiṣekopadeśakrama indrabhūti rin chen 'khor lo'i dbang gi man ngag gi rim pa/_slob dpon in+d+ra b+hu ti'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

sarvatathāgatatattvasaṁgrahamahāyānābhisamayanāmatantravyākhyā-tattvālokakarī-nāma kun dga' snying po/(ānandagarbha) thugs rje chen po/(mahākaruṇa) 'phags pa shes rab/(āryaprajā) 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i theg pa chen po'i mdo'i bshad pa de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/grangs la rmongs pa gzhig pa'i phyir/_/gzhung 'di'i grangs kyi tshad dag ni/_/stong phrag dag ni bco brgyad du/_/'gro la phan pa bskyed phyir byas/_/slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'o/_/'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bu'i myang ro yul khams kyi/_/pad+ma'i snying po lta bu'i dgon gnas dbyar thang du/_/mgon pa byams pa lta bu'i mkhas pa thugs rje la/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po lta bu lha rjes gsol btab nas/_/tshong dpon nor bzang bzhin du dga' bas bsgyur ba lags/_nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du sa stengs rgyas par shog_/yon gyi bdag po chen po jo sras lce 'bar gyis bskul nas/_rgya gar gyi mkhas pa paN+Di ta chen po thugs rje chen po dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

255b6-285a7 rgyud 'grel, chu 255b6-285a7 (vol.78, p.168) rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba badzra bi d+ha Na ma d+ha ra Ni/ b+ha shaM prit+t/ pA rI paM nA Ma vajravidāraṇā-nāma-dhāraṇīpaṭalakramabhāṣyavṛttipradīpa-nāma ye shes rdo rje/(jānavajra) buddhaguhya rin chen bzang po/(ratnabhadra) śraddhākaravarma ka pa dpal brtsegs/(śrīkūṭarakṣita) slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka varma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba shAkyi'i dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

285a7-344a7 rgyud 'grel, chu 285a7-344a7 (vol.78, p.180) kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa sa man ta mu kha pri pe sha ra smi po ma loSh+NA Sha prab+ta sa sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki te nA ma d+ha ra NI saM brid ti samantamukhapraveśaraśmivimaloṣṇīṣaprabhāsasarvatathāgatahṛdayasamayavilokita-nāma-dhāraṇīvṛtti lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa/(sahajalalita) jayadeva lang tshul khrims brtsegs/(śīlakūṭa) kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa/_slob dpon dngos grub thob pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/gsang sngags rig 'dzin sde snod la/_mkha' ltar shes rab dang ba ni/_nyi ma lta bur ma rmongs pa'i/_mkhas pa dza ya de ba la/_langs ban de tshul brtsegs kyis/_gus bcas mang du gsol btab nas/_spu rgyal bod las khyad par du/_nad med sa gtsang mdo khams su/_yid bzhin nor 'dra'i gzungs mchog gi_/'grel pa dpag bsam shing 'dra 'di/_bsgyur ba'i dge bas dad ldan rnams/_gzungs 'di rgya cher spyod par shog_/paN+Di ta dza ya de ba dang /_lo tsA ba lang ban+t+te tshul khrims brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o
1512 Q3513 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, chu681KG13237rgyud 'grel
344a8-357a8 rgyud 'grel, chu 344a8-357a8 (vol.78, p.203) de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha b+hA ra si tA ta pra tre nA ma brid ti sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣabhavasitātapatrā-nāma-vṛtti śūraṁgamavajra zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab/(āryāprajā) 'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon shu+A rA~M ga ma badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur

42b1-84b2 rgyud 'grel, nu 42b1-84b2 (vol.81, p.125-142) de kho na nyid la 'jugs pa zhes bya ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' ma lus pa mdor bsdus te bshad pa'i rab tu byed pa tat+t+wA ba ta rA khya sa ka la s+wak ta ba tsa sta da pa r+ya bya khya ka ra nA ma tattvāvatārākhyasakalasugatavacastātparyavyākhyāprakaraṇa ye shes grags pa/(jānakīrti) padmākaravarma rin chen bzang po de kho na nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba bde gshegs pa'i bka' ma lus pa mdor bsdus te bshad pa'i rab tu byed pa/ slob dpon dpal ye shes grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma kA ra barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

2534 Q4535 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, nu741KG13243rgyud 'grel

133a2-184b3 rgyud 'grel, nu 133a2-184b3 (vol.81, p.161-182) de nyid mthong ba'i lam zhes bya ba ta+t+wa mArgA dar+sha na nA ma tattvamārgadarśana-nāma ye shes rdo rje/(jānavajra) buddhapāla ye shes rdo rje/(jānavajra) vihara de nyid mthong ba'i lam dpal ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal de nyid dang /_lo tsA ba rngog bud+d+ha pA las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/_dpal shin tu tshogs 'khor sar gsol ba btab nas lha khang bi ha rar bsgyur ba'o

4a8-5a5 rgyud 'grel, pu 4a8-5a5 (vol.81, p.289-290) de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa zhes bya ba sarba ta thA ga sta ba nA ma saravatathāgatastava-nāma klu'i blo/(nāgabuddhi) vanaratna chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde/ 'gos gzhon nu'i zhabs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/_/rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po mchog grub pa'i dbang phyug shrI ba na rat+na'i zhal snga nas dang /_'gos lo tsA ba gzhon nu'i zhabs kyi bka' drin las dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur ba'o

2607 Q4608 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pu751KG13244rgyud 'grel
5b5-12a8 rgyud 'grel, pu 5b5-12a8 (vol.81, p.290-293) dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi snying po'i 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba ka la tsag kra tan tra/ bri ti bi ma la pra b+ha na ma kālacakratantra\[hṛdaya\]vṛttivimalaprabhā-nāma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug(avalokiteśvara) bhadrabodhi gyi co zla ba'i 'od zer/(candraprabha) zhang yon bdag dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi snying po'i rgya cher 'grel/_dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/sam pa la'i yul byon zhing /_mngon par shes pa mnga' brnyes pa/_dus kyi 'khor lo pa zhes pa/_de'i rim ni brgyud pa dang /_u rgyan yul skyes bram ze'i rigs/_na ro pa zhes bya ba ni/_nus pa skyes shing lhas gnang ba/_de'i rigs rgyud thos pa'i/_bla ma lha'i sa lhas bstan pa/_de mnyan rgya 'grel 'bad bsgyur pas/_mi 'dzags bde ba'i gnas thob shog_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI b+ha dra bo d+ha'i zhal snga nas/_bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/_yon bdag zhing btsun dge slong gi phyir bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

12b1-20b8 rgyud 'grel, pu 12b1-20b8 (vol.81, p.293-296) dbang gi rab tu byed pa se ka pra gi ya sekaprakriyā zla ba mgon po/(candranātha) shes rab grags/(prajākīrti) dbang gi rab 'byed pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po zla ba mgon po dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba shes rab grags kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//'di bris dge ba yod pa des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa/_mi 'gyur bde ba thob par shog_/dang po gnyis ni kun tu 'gro/_brgyad dang bcu gsum sku yin no/_gsum drug bdun dang bcu bzhi pa gsung /_bzhi dgu bcu pa thugs su shes/_lnga bcu gcig ye shes so/_sprul pa la gnyis ste/_rang rgyud pa ni rgyal po grags pa lta bu ste/_'jam dpal dngos kyi sprul pa'o/_byin gyi rlabs kyi sprul pa ni/_nyi ma'i shing rta lta bu ste/_'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sprul pa'o/_dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir ni/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes ma smos la/_dgyes rdor la sogs par ni 'di skad la sogs pa smos pa ni 'gal bar mi 'gyur te/_'di dbang po rtul ba rnams la yab rgyab po zas gtsang ma dang /_yum lha mo sgyur 'phrul ma'i sras su skye ba bzhes pa la bstan pa yin pa dang /_dka' thub la sogs pa'i spyod pa bstan pa dang /_sams kri ta'i skad kyis gsungs pa dang /_'di skad bdag gis zhes pa'i 'dul bar rka ba rnams la gsungs pa yin pa dang /_yul sham b+ha la na gnas pa'i gang zag dbang po yang rab tu gyur pa'i gang zag de la theg pa chen po'i sned du rung ba'i rnams la/_zhu ba po phyag na rdo rje'i sprul pa rgyal po zla ba bzang po dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos su byon nas chos gsungs pa'o/_/de la kun mkhyen ye shes sku zhes pa ye shes nas sku bzhi'i bdag nyid can ltar yin no zhes gsungs so
2609 Q4610 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, pu751KG13244rgyud 'grel
21a1-50b8 rgyud 'grel, pu 21a1-50b8 (vol.81, p.296-) rang gi lta ba'i 'dod pa mdor bstan pa yongs su brtag pa zhes bya ba pradar+sha nA nu ma tod de sha pa rIk+Sha nA ma pradarśanānumatoddeśaparīkṣā-nāma 'jam pa'i dbyangs mi'i dbang po grags pa/(majughoṣa narendrakīrti) chos grags dpal bzang po/(dharmakīrtiśrībhadra) majuśrī blo gros brtan pa/(sthiramati) rang gi lta ba'i 'dod pa mdor bstan pa yongs su brtag pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs mi'i dbang po grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/gzhung gi tshad ni sho lo ka brgyad cu rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i drug brgya'i grangs so/_'di ni sgra dang mngon brjod la sogs pa tha snyad kyi gtsug lag rnams la blo'i snang ba cher rgyas pa bal po'i paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI dang /_mkhas pa'i dbang po dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa'i bka' drin la brten nas/_lo tsA bar gtogs pa shAkya'i dge slong chos grags dpal bzang pos dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por/_gangs ri'i khrod du sngon chad ma byung ba 'di legs par bsgyur ba'o/_/'gran phyir ma yin grags pa 'dod phyir min/_ston dang bstan bcos dag la gus phyir dang /_dam pa 'ga' yi bka' yis bskul ba'i phyir/_gangs can khrod na sngon chad med 'di bsgyur/_'di las bskrun pa'i dge ba ci mchis pa/_de yang 'gro ba'i byang chub don du bsngo/_bdag kyang gang la gang 'dul skad rnams kyis/_mtha' yas 'gro la dam chos ston par shog_/bod la bka' drin che ba 'jig rten mig_/kun gyi phyi mo 'thon mi sam b+ho Tas/_mdzad pa'i yi ge'i gzugs dang brda mkhas pa'i/_ye ge pa dag gis kyang 'di rtog shog /_rnam par shes pas dpyod pa la/_rnam par g.yeng bas g.yengs pa'i phyir/_rnam par ma dag mchis srid na/_rnam par byang ba rnams la bshags/_/slar yang bzang ldan dben pa'i gnas su rgya dpe dang gtugs pa'i zhus dag kyang grub par bgyis so

147b6-148b8 rgyud 'grel, zu 147b6-148b8 (vol.86, p.111) rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba badzra tsan d+ha na rka na po tsa kra na ma vajracaṇḍānusāreṇa pṛṣṭhyacakra-nāma las kyi rdo rje/(karmavajra) dpal rdo rje gtum po'i sgo nas rbod gtong phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo/_slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar mu stegs pa'i mthu bzlog pa'i don du mdzad pa'i gsung /_bla ma wa la tsan dras/_rje ras chung pa la gnang ba'o/_mgo dang /_gshen dang /_ras pa dang /_su ga badzra bdag las brgyud gsung ngo/_'di lag len cig yod sem mo
2850 Q4851 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
149a1-153a5 rgyud 'grel, zu 149a1-153a5 (vol.86, p.111-113) U Ni sha sngags kyi man ngag gi bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba uSh+NI Sha man+t+ra u pa de sha sad da na nA ma uṣṇīṣamantropadeśasādhana-nāma śrīsiṁha vairocana śrīsiṁha U Sh+Ni Sha ri rab ma'i sgrub thabs/_slob dpon shrI sing ngas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta de nyid dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
1732 Q4852 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
153a5-160a4 rgyud 'grel, zu 153a5-160a4 (vol.86, p.113-116) rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba badzra byi d+ha ra ma d+ha la bi ti Ti na ma vajravidāraṇīmaṇḍalavidhi-nāma rdo rje go cha/(vajravarman) rin chen bzang po rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
2027 Q4853 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
160a5-163a4 rgyud 'grel, zu 160a5-163a4 (vol.86, p.116-117) sgrol ma nor sbyin ma'i sgrub thabs d+ha nad tA ra sA d+ha na dhanadātārāsādhana sahajaśrī nam mkha' bzang po/(gaganabhadra) kumāraśrībhadra dpon po grags pa rin chen sgrol ma nor sbyin ma'i bsgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po sa ha dza shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/mkhyen rab thugs rje rab kyi phul du byung pa dpag tu med pas spras pa chos rje bla ma dam pa spyan snga rin po che grags pa byang chub rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' lung dang /_dpon po grags pa rin chen gyi gsung bzhin du/_sne gdong nang so nas yo byad phun sum tshogs pa stsal te gnas de nyed du/_kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po ku mA ra shrI b+ha dra dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba nam mkha' bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
2853 Q4854 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
163a4-163b8 rgyud 'grel, zu 163a4-163b8 (vol.86, p.117) sgrol ma u gra'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba u gra tA ra bU dzA bi d+hi nA ma ugratārāpūjāvidhi-nāma śariputramahāsvami (śāriputramahāsvāmin) śariputramahāsvami (śāriputramahāsvāmin) sgrol ma u gra'i mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /rdo rje gdan gyi mkhan po shrI sha ri pu tra ma hA swa mi'i zhal mnga' nas mdzad de/ rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o
2854 Q4855 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
163b8-164b5 rgyud 'grel, zu 163b8-164b5 (vol.86, p.117-118) sgrol ma dmar mos 'gro ba dbang du bsdu pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba staM tA ra wa shaM bi d+hi na tsakra nA ma raktatārājagadvaśaṁkaracakravidhi-nāma rdo rje gdan pa/(vajrāsana (gayā)) sgrol ma dmar mos 'gro ba dbang du bsdud pa'i man ngag 'khor lo dang bcas pa rdo rje gdan pa bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
