177b4-178b5 tsha tsha'i cho ga tsI ta ba ti citāvidhi mar me mdzad ye shes/(dīpaṁkarajāna) gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer/(candraprabha) tibaṁkaraśrījāna (dīpaṁkaraśrījāna) tsha tsha'i cho ga_/slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/gsang ngo/_dge bshes sbyang nga bya yul ba'i/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
2868 Q4869 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
178b6-181a8 rgyud 'grel, zu 178b6-181a8 (vol.86, p.123-124) 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa mu tig 'phreng ba zhes bya ba ar+ya tA ra de bi stod tra gu lu ta ma la sa d+ha na ma āryatārādevīstotramuktikāmālā-nāma cantragomi (candragomin) nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba/(śīlajaya) tibaṁkarasrījana (dīpaṁkaraśrījāna) 'phags pa sgrol ma la rig pa'i gnas rnam pa lnga la ma rmongs pa snyan ngag mkhan po rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bu/_slob dpon chen po tsan tra go mi'am 'chi med zla ba zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti paM ka ra shri dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/_bod kyi ban+de sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bi ka ma la shrI la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
2869 Q4870 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
181a8-182a4 rgyud 'grel, zu 181a8-182a4 (vol.86, p.124-125) 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa ar+ya de bi ta ra stod tra āryatārādevīstotra. (candragomin) lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/slob dpon gyis sgrol mi'i shing sku de la bstod pas phyag 'dzub ke re mdzad skad/_de ltar mdzad pa ci lags zhus pas/_khyod kyi bstod pa de snyan gsungs te sgrol ma 'dzub ker du grags so
2870 Q4871 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
182a4-182b8 rgyud 'grel, zu 182a4-182b8 (vol.86, p.125) 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa smon lam grub pa zhes bya ba Ar+ya ta ra stod tra pra ni d+ha na na ma āryatārāstotrapraṇidhāna\[siddhi\]-nāma (candragomin) rje btsun ma sgrol ma la bstod pa smon lam thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'o
2871 Q4872 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
182b8-184a8 rgyud 'grel, zu 182b8-184a8 (vol.86, p.125) bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba b+ha ga wa ti ar+ya ta ra sto tra na ma bhagabatyāryatārāstotra-nāma dad byed go cha rin chen/(śraddhākaravarmaratna) rig pa'i khu byug ye shes kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen po la/ shAkya'i dge slong dad byed go cha rin chen zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba rig pa'i khu byug gis bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa'o
2872 Q4873 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel

'di mtshan yongs su grags pa rin po ches gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba gnyan dge slong d+harma kirtisa ras 'gyur du gtan la phab pa'o

āryatārābhaṭṭārikā-nāma-dvātriṁśatkastotra sarvārthasādhakaratnālaṁkārasaṁnibha-nāma nyi ma sbas pa/(sūryagupta) rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bstod pa don thams cad grub par byed pa/_rin chen brgyan 'dra zhes bya ba/_kha che nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

2880 Q4881 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel

2882 Q4883 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel

2883 Q4884 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel

sarasvatī \[devī\]stotra nag mo'i khol/(kālidāsa) chos 'bar/(dharmajvāla) jānaśīla lho phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba'i mkhas pa chen po paN+Di ta nag mo'i khol gyis dbyangs can ma zhal gzigs pa'i dus su dgyes te bstod pa rdzogs so/_/gang zhig 'di 'don pa la shes rab stsol bar khas blangs so/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dz+nyA na sil dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o
2885 Q4886 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
200b4-204a5 rgyud 'grel, zu 200b4-204a5 (vol.86, p.132133) tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs a yu a pa ra mi ta sa d+ha na ma aparimitāyur-nāma-sādhana ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mo/(jānaḍākinī siddharājī) bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs/_ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so
992 Q4887 1KG13126rgyud 'grel, zu841KG13253rgyud 'grel
204a5-211a5 rgyud 'grel, zu 204a5-211a5 (vol.86, p.133136) tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nyA na maN Da la b+hi ti ni ma aparimitāyurjñānamaṇḍalavidhi-nāma zla ba bzang po/(candrabhadra) glan darma tshul khrims bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par byas so

211a5-227a2 rgyud 'grel, zu 211a5-227a2 (vol.86, p.136143) bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba a pa ra mit ta b+ha ga bA ti a yu dz+nyA na/ maN+Da la bi ti na ma bhagavadaparimitāyurjñānamaṇḍalavidhi-nāma ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mo/(jānaḍākinī siddharājī) bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dbang bzhi bskur ba'i cho ga'i las khrigs/_'chi med ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa zhes bya ba/_ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

309b1-319b8 sher phyin, ma 309b1-319b8 (vol.94, p.288-292) bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA h+ri da yAr+tha bra dI pa nA ma TI ka bhagavatīprajñāpāramitāhṛdayaṭīkā-arthapradīpa-nāma bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_bal yul ye rang gi grong khyer du rje btsun bla ma dam pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bod kyi dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams kyis chos zhus pa'i dus su/_bla ma dam pas chos ston pham babs gnang ba'i nyin bar bod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis mdo bton pa la/_bla ma dam pas lo tsA ba la khong 'don pa de ci yin gsungs pas/_lo tsA bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po lags zhus pas/_'o na bod du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po dar na sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa de bden pa yin no/_snying po'i don gyi gdams ngag shes sam gsungs pa la/_lo ci bas ma 'tshal zhes lan btab pa la/_'o na ngas khyed rnams la gdams ngag bstan gyis gsungs nas/_snying po'i don gyis gdams ngag gnang ba zin ris bris nas nan tan byas pa yin no/_bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi pad ma'i sbrang rtsi smyo chu 'thungs nas su/_skye med bde chen bung ba smyon pa'i kha la su zhig mnyan du yod/_gal te smyon pa'i tshig la bden pa yod srid thugs la dgongs nas su/_mthun pa'i grogs po rnams kyi mi bden na yang don 'di dgongs par zhu/_gal te stong pa thabs yin na/_de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/_rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan med phyir/_thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin/_lta ba rnams las legs rnams dang /_bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi/_bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa bstan/_srid zhi mnyam nyid dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum/_'gro ba'i bde sgrub thabs mkhas ston par byed/_gzhung gi bdag nyid rin chen lta bu la/_dad dang gus pas yang yang phyag 'tshal lo/_phan sems spro dgas bris pa'i 'grel pa 'di/_gang zag dam pa rnams kyi phyag tu brgyud pa dang /_bstan pa'i bya ba mdzad pa bdag gi smon lam yin/_chos nyid bden pas de ltar grub gyur cig
3166 Q5220 1KG13126mdo 'grel, ma1041KG13273mdo 'grel
319b8-330b6 sher phyin, ma 319b8-330b6 (vol.94, p.292-296) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i rgya cher 'grel pa Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA h+r-i da ya TI kA āryaprajñāpāramitāhṛdayaṭīkā praśāstrasena shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po rgya cher 'grel pa pra shAs+t+ra se nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
3904 Q5221 1KG13126mdo 'grel, ma1041KG13273mdo 'grel
330b6-333a6 sher phyin, ma 330b6-333a6 (vol.94, p.296-297)sher phyin, ma
330b6-333a6 shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snyin po zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA h+r-i da ya nA ma TI kA prajñāpāramitāhṛdaya-ṭīkā kamalaśīla kumaraśivatra (kumāraśrībhadra) 'phags pa shes rab/(āryapraja) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma ra shi ba tra dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3168 Q5222 1KG13126mdo 'grel, ma1041KG13273mdo 'grel
333a6-338b4 sher phyin, ma 333a6-338b4 (vol.94, p.297-299)sher phyin, ma
330b6-338b4 shes rab snying po'i rnam par bshad pa
prajñāhṛdayavyākhyā mar me mdzad dpal ye shes/(dīpaṁkaraśrījāna) dīpaṁkaraśrījāna tshul khrims rgyal ba/(jayaśīla) rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shri dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3167 Q5223 1KG13126mdo 'grel, ma1041KG13273mdo 'grel
338b4-350a8 sher phyin, ma 338b4-350a8 (vol.94, p.299-?) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i don yongs su shes pa pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta h+r-i da ya pa ri tse ya prajñāpāramitāhṛdayārthaparijñāna mahājana mahājana seng ge rgyal mtshan/(siṁhadhvaja) shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin pa'i snying po yongs su shes pa/_paN+Di ta shrI ma hA dza nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3169 Q5224 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
1b1-22b2 dbu ma, tsa 1a1-22b2 (vol.95, p.1-11)dbu ma, tsa
1b1-22b2 dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba pradz+nyA nA ma mU la mA d+h+ya ma ka kA ri kA prajñā-nāma-mūlamadhyamakakārikā klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) hasumati jānagarbha cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan/ pa tshab nyi ma grags dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa rnam par bzhag pa/_don dam pa'i de kho na yang dag par ston pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/_rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas/_bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa/_dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_'di la rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod/_bam po ni phyed dang gnyis su byas so/_slad kyis kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dpung gtsug lag khang rin chen sbas pa'i dbus su/_kha che'i mkhan po ha su ma ti dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba ba tshab nyi ma grags kyis mi'i bdag po 'phags pa lha'i sku ring la 'grel pa tshig gsal ba dang bstun nas bcos pa'
3170 Q5225 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
22b2-25a7 dbu ma, tsa 22b2-25a7 (vol.95, p.11-12)dbu ma, tsa
22b2-25a7 rigs pa drug cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba yug ti Sha Sh+Tha kA kA ri kA nA ma yuktiṣaṣṭikākārikā-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) mutitaśrī (muditaśrī) pa tshab nyi ma grags rigs pa drug cu'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ti ta shrI'i zhal snga nas dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bcos te gtan la phab pa'o
3171 Q5226 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
25a7-27a4 dbu ma, tsa 25a7-27a4 (vol.95, p.12-13)dbu ma, tsa
22b2-27a4 zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i mdo be da l+ya sU tra nA ma vaidalyasūtra-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) ananta (ānanda) grags 'byor shes rab zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /kha che'i paN+Di ta a nan+ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
3172 Q5227 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
27a4-30b3 dbu ma, tsa 27a4-30b3 (vol.95, p.13-14)dbu ma, tsa
25a7-30b3 stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba shU n+Ya tA sap+ta ti kA ri kA nA ma śūnyatāsaptatikārikā-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) gnyan darma grags/ gzhon nu mchog stong nyid bdun cu pa tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/lo tsA ba gzhon nu mchog dang /_gnyan d+harma grags dang /_khu'i 'gyur dag las/_don dang tshig bzang du bris pa'o
3173 Q5228 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
30b3-34a2 dbu ma, tsa 30b3-34a2 (vol.95, p.14-15)dbu ma, tsa
30b3-34a2 rtsod pa bzlog pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba l+ye kra ha bya barta ni kA ri kA nA ma vigrahavyāvartanīkārikā-nāma klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) jayānanda jānagarbha ka ba dpal brtsegs/ khu mdo sde dpal rtsod pa bzlog pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur pa las/_slad kyis kha che'i paN+Di ta dza ya A nan+ta dang /_lo tsA ba khu mdo sde dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
3174 Q5229 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
34a2-114a8 dbu ma, tsa 34a2-114a8 (vol.95, p.15-47)dbu ma, tsa
34a2-114a8 dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa ga las 'jigs med mu la ma d+h+ya mi ka bit+ti u ka to b+ha ya mūlamadhyamakrvṛttiakutobhayā klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) jānagarbha klu'i rgyal mtshan dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dz+nyA na garba dang/_bod kyi zhu chen gyis lo tsA ba/_dge slong klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhu chen gyis te gtan la phab pa/_theg pa chen po'i nges don/_dbu ma'i bstan bcos shes rab ces bya ba'i 'grel pa mdzad pa/_slob dpon klu sgrub dang /_gnas brtan bud d+ha pA li ta dang /_tsan dra kIrti dang /_de ba sharma dang /_gi Na shrI dang /_gi Na ma ti dang /_s+thi ra ma ti dang /_legs ldan 'byed dang brgyad ces gna' mchan cig las 'byung /_'di la rab tu byed pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun/_sho lo ka nyis stong chig brgya yod/_bam po ni bdun du byas so
3175 Q5230 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
114a8-126a5 dbu ma, tsa 114a8-126a5 (vol.95, p.47-52)dbu ma, tsa
114a8-126a5 zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bai da l+yaM nA ma pra ka ra Na vaidalya-nāma-prakaraṇa klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) jaya ānatta (jayānanda) khu mdo sde 'bar tshad ma la sogs pa tshig gi don bcu drug sel bar byed pa zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa'i rab tu byed pa/_slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po/_yon tan grags pa'i bkas/_kha che'i paN+Di ta dza ya a nan+ta dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong khu mdo sde 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3176 Q5231 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
126a5-138a7 dbu ma, tsa 126a5-138a7 (vol.95, p.52-57)dbu ma, tsa
126a5-138a7 stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i 'grel pa shu n+yA ta s+ya sap+ti ta brit+ti śūnyatāsaptativṛtti klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i bshad pa/ brda' sprod pa chen po bstan bcos thams cad 'chad par bzhed pa/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
3177 Q5232 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
138a7-156a4 dbu ma, tsa 138a7-156a4 (vol.95, p.57-64)dbu ma, tsa
138a7-156a4 rtsod pa bzlog pa'i 'grel pa be gra ha bya barta ni brit+ti vigrahavyāvartanīvṛtti nāgārjuna jānagarbha venarakṣita rtsod pa bzlog pa'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la bzhugs pa slob dpon nA gA rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nya na gar+b+ha dang lo tsA ba ban+de ben rak+Shi tas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o
1092 Q5233 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
156a4-157a5 dbu ma, tsa 156a4-157a5 (vol.95, p.64-65)dbu ma, tsa
156a4-157a5 theg pa chen po nyi shu pa ma hA ya na bing+sha kI mahāyānaviṁśaka klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) cantrakumara (candrakumāra) shAkya 'od theg pa chen po nyi shu pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po tsan+d+ra ku ma ra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur
3179 Q5234 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
157a5-157a8 dbu ma, tsa 157a5-157a8 (vol.95, p.65)dbu ma, tsa
157a5-157a8 yi ge brgya pa ak+Sha ra sha ta ka akṣaraśataka ye ge brgya pa rdzogs so
3180 Q5235 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
157b1-165b8 dbu ma, tsa 157b1-165b8 (vol.95, p.65-68)dbu ma, tsa
157b1-165b8 yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa ak+Sha ra sha ta ka ti nA ma brit+ti akṣaraśataka-nāma-vṛtti klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) ananta (ānanda) grags 'byor shes rab/ gzhon nu shes rab yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/dpal kha che'i grong khyer dpe med du ban+de gzhon nu shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/_slad kyi paN+Di ta/_a nan+ta dang /_lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyis zhu chen legs par byas so
3181 Q5236 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
165b8-166a6 dbu ma, tsa 165b8-166a6 (vol.95, p.68)dbu ma, tsa
165b8-166a6 rten cing 'grel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa pra ti t+ya sa mut+pA da h+r-i da ya kA ri kA pratītyasamutpādahṛdayakārikā klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
3181 Q5237 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
166a7-168b4 dbu ma, tsa 166a7-168b4 (vol.95, p.68-69)dbu ma, tsa
166a7-168b4 rten cing 'grel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i rnam par bshad pa pra ti t+ya sa mut+pA da h+ri da ya bya khya na pratītyasamutpādahṛdayavyākhyā klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) dhanaśila (dānaśīla) jinamitra śilendrabodhe (śīlendrabodhi) ye shes sde rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i rnam par bshad pa/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_d+ha na shi la dang /_shi lAn+d+ra bo b+hi dang /_ban+de ye shes sdes la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3183 Q5238 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
168b4-169b7 dbu ma, tsa 168b4-169b7 (vol.95, p.69-70)dbu ma, tsa
168b4-169b7 ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa a bu d+ha bo d+ha ka nA ma pra kA ra na abhudhabodhaka-nāma-prakaraṇa klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) ananta (ānanda) grags 'byor shes rab ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa/_zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/_gnyi ga bdag med par rab tu gsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/paN+Di ta a nan+ta dang /_lo tsA ba grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
3184 Q5239 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
169b7-170b5 dbu ma, tsa 169b7-170b5 (vol.95, p.70)dbu ma, tsa
169b7-170b5 skye med rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba rat+na su ko Sha nA ma ratnāsūkośa-nāma klu sgrub snying po/(nāgārjunagarbha) kanagavarma (kanakavarman) suryakirti (sūryakīrti) skye med rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba 'phags pa klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ga bar ma dang /_lo tsA ba sur+ya kIrtis lha sar mo cher bsgyur ba'o
3185 Q5240 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
170b5-171b4 dbu ma, tsa 170b5-171b4 (vol.95, p.70)dbu ma, tsa
170b5-171b4 srid pa 'pho ba b+ha ba saM kran+ti bhavasaṁkrānti klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) dbu ma srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
3186 Q5241 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
171b4-178b2 dbu ma, tsa 171b4-178b2 (vol.95, p.71-73) srid pa'i 'pho ba'i Ti ka b+ha ba sa ma kran+ti Ti ka bhavasaṁkrāntiṭīkā byams pa mgon po/(maitreyanātha) gru ston chung / zla ba gzhon nu 'gro ba rigs drug las srid pa 'pho ba'i thabs sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i thabs rdzogs so//_paN+Di ta byams pa mgon pos mdzad pa'o/_paN+Di ta zla ba gzhon nu la/_gru ston chung gis zhus nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so
3187 Q5242 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
178b2-317a4 dbu ma, tsa 178b2-317a4 (vol.95, p.73-129)dbu ma, tsa
178b2-317a4 dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa bud+d+ha pA li ta bud+d+ha pA li ta mU la ma d+h+ya ma ka br-it+ti buddhapālitamūlamadhyamakavṛtti sangs rgyas bskyangs/(buddhapālita) janagarbha (jānagarbha) cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa rnam par bzhag pa don dam pa'i de kho na yang dag par ston pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rabs dang /_thugs rjer ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla na med pa'i tshul rab tu 'byed pa rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dang 'od ces bya bar 'gyur bas mdzad pa/_de'i 'grel pa/_bud+d+ha pA li ta/_zhes bya pa theg pa chen po nges pa'i don ston pa/_lta ba ngan pa'i dri ma sel bar byed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gtan la 'bebs pa/_don dam pa'i bden pa gsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon btsun pa sangs rgyas bskyangs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bka' grub pa bstan bcos du ma'i rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i gnas khyad par can du gshegs pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3188 Q5243 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
317b1-319a5 dbu ma, tsa 317b1-319a5 (vol.95, p.129)dbu ma, tsa
317b1-319a5 rang bzhin gsum la 'jug pa'i sgrub pa s+wa b+ha wa tra ya pra ba sha se d+he svabhāvatrayapraveśasiddhi klu sgrub/(nāgārjuna) zla ba grags mtshan nyid gsum la 'jug pa/ slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal mnga' nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /kha che'i paN+Di ta dge slong zla ba grags pas bsgyur ba'o
3189 Q5244 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
319a5-319b3 dbu ma, tsa 319a5-319b3 (vol.95, p.129-130)dbu ma, tsa
319a5-319b3 cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa ha sta ba la nA ma pra ka ra Na hastavāla-nāma-prakaraṇa 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) śraddhakaravarma (śraddhākaravarman) rin chen bzang po cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/_slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po'i bsgyur ba'o
3190 Q5245 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsa1051KG13274mdo 'grel
319b3-321a8 dbu ma, tsa 319b3-321a8 (vol.95, p.130)dbu ma, tsa
319b3-321a8 cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa ha sta ba la nA ma ora kA ra Na br-it+ti hastavāla-nāma-prakaraṇavṛtti 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) śraddhakaravarma (śraddhākaravarman) rin chen bzang po cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
3191 Q5246 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
1b1-20b1 dbu ma, tsha 1a1-20b1 (vol.95, p.131-140)dbu ma, tsha
1b1-20b1 bstan bcos bzhi brgya pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa tsa tuH sha ta ka sAstra kA ri kA nA ma catuḥśatakaśāstra-nāma-kārikā 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) susmajāna (sūkṣmajana) nyi ma grags byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa bstan bcos bzhi brgya pa'i tshig le'u' byas pa zhes bya ba/_sing+ga la'i gling du pad+ma'i sbubs las brdzus te 'khrungs shing /_rang rang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta ba rnam par 'byed pas dbu ma'i lam rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa/_'phags pa klu'i zhabs kyi sras su gyur ba'i slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/kha che'i brong khyer dpe med kyi dbus/_rin chen sbas pa'i kun dga' ra bar/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su sma dz+nyA na dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3192 Q5247 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
20b1-24a8 dbu ma, tsha 20b1-24a8 (vol.95, p.140-141)dbu ma, tsha
20b1-24a8 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i rigs pa gtan tshigs grub pa zhes bya ba sa kha li ta pra ma d+ha na yuk+tA he tu si d+d+hi nA ma skhalitapramathanayuktihetusiddhi-nāma 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) sarvajaadeva dpal brtsegs 'khrul ba bzlog pa'i rigs pa gtan tshigs grub pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA na de ba dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/_gtan la phab pa'o
3193 Q5248 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
24a8-24b5 dbu ma, tsha 24a8-24b5 (vol.95, p.141-142)dbu ma, tsha
24a8-24b5 rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ul byas pa ha stA b+ha ba pra ka ra Na kA ri kA hastavālaprakaraṇakārikā 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so
3194 Q5249 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
24b6-26b4 dbu ma, tsha 24b6-26b4 (vol.95, p.142)dbu ma, tsha
24b6-26b4 lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa ha s+tA b+ha ba brit+ti hastavālavṛtti 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) dānaśīla dpal brtsegs/ dpal 'byor snying po rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shrI la dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong dpal 'byor snying pos bsgyur cing /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o
3195 Q5250 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
26b4-29a5 dbu ma, tsha 26b4-29a5 (vol.95, p.142-143)dbu ma, tsha
26b4-29a5 dbu ma 'khrul pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba b+hA ma ga tA ma d+h+ya nA ma madhyamakabhramaghāta-nāma āryadeva dīpaṁkaraśrījāna tshul khrims rgyal ba dbu ma 'khrul pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gyi rgyal po su kha tsar+yas nA lan+da'i gtsug lag khang chen por gsol ba btab nas mdzad do
3196 Q5251 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
29a5-31a3 dbu ma, tsha 29a5-31a3 (vol.95, p.143-144)dbu ma, tsha
29a5-31a3 ye shes snying po kun las btus pa zhes bya ba dz+nyA na sA ra sa muts+tsha ya nA ma jñānasārasamuccaya-nāma 'phags pa lha/(āryadeva) kṛṣṇarava chos kyi shes rab ye shes snying po kun las btus pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na ra ba dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3197 Q5252 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
31a3-53b3 dbu ma, tsha 31a3-53b3 (vol.95, p.144-153) ye shes snying po kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i bshad sbyar dz+nyA na sA ra sa muts+tsha ya nA ma ban+d+ha na jñānasārasamuccaya-nāma-nibandhana byang chub bzang po/(bodhibhadra) śāntibhadra chos kyi shes rab ye shes snying po kun las btus pa'i bshad sbyar slob dpon byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyis shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3198 Q5253 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
53b3-326a6 dbu ma, tsha 53b3-326a6 (vol.95, p.153-262)dbu ma, tsha
53b3-326a6 dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma pradz+nyA pra dI pa mU la ma d+h+ya ma ka br-it+ti prajñāpradīpamūlamadhyamakavṛtti legs ldan byed/(bhāvaviveka) jānagarbha cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/_'di la rab tu byed pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun /_sh+lo ka ni drug stong yod/_bam po ni nyi shur byas so
3199 Q5254 1KG13126mdo 'grel, tsha1061KG13275mdo 'grel
326a6-365a3 dbu ma, tsha 326a6-365a3 (vol.95, p.262-?)dbu ma, tsha
326a6-365a3 dbu ma rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba ma d+hya ma ka rat+na pra dI paM nA ma madhyamakaratnapradīpa-nāma bhavya dīpaṁkaraśrījāna nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba/ rgya brtson 'grus seng ge bka' ma lus pa'i snying po bsdus pa/ de kho na nyid gsal por ston pa/ dbu ma rin po che'i sgron ma/ bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'/ rgya mtsho lta bu mkhyen pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ sku tshe 'di nyid la/ sku lus de nyid kyis rig 'dzin gyi gnas su gshegs pa'i/ slon dpon mkhas pa chen po/ b+ha byas/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi gsung bzhin du mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma rje btsun zangs gling pa/ dge bsnyen mgon po la/ paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas/ bka' drin zhus pa las/ phyis so ma phu ra'i gtsug lag khang du/ rgya brtson 'grus seng+ge dang / nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba gnyis kyis/ yang nas yang du zhus nas/ bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
3200 Q5255 1KG13126mdo 'grel, dza1071KG13276mdo 'grel
1b1-43b7 dbu ma, dza 1a1-43b7 (vol.96, p.1-19)dbu ma, dza
1b1-43b7 dbu ma'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa ma d+h+ya ma ka h+ri da ya kA ri kA madhyamakahṛdayakārikā bhavya dīpaṁkaraśrījāna tshul khrims rgyal ba dbu ma'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon chen po b+ha byas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/ra sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang gi gzhir/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3201 Q5256 1KG13126mdo 'grel, dza1071KG13276mdo 'grel
43b7-374b1 dbu ma, dza 43b7-374b1 (vol.96, p.19-154)dbu ma, dza
43b7-374b1 dbu ma'i snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba ma d+h+ya ma ka h+r-i da ya brit+ti tar kA dz+wA la madhyamakahṛdayavṛttitarkajvālā bhavya dīpaṁkaraśrījāna tshul khrims rgyal ba dbu ma'i snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba/_slob dpon b+ha byas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/ra sa 'phrul snang gtsug lag khang gi gzhir/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang/_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3203 Q5257 1KG13126mdo 'grel, dza1071KG13276mdo 'grel
380a7-380b5 dbu ma, dza 380a7-380b5 (vol.96, p.154) dbu ma rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ma d+h+ya ma pra tI t+ya sa mud pA da nA ma madhyamakapratītyasamutpāda-nāma nag po/(kṛṣṇa) dbu ma rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
3202 Q5258 1KG13126mdo 'grel, dza1071KG13276mdo 'grel
380b5-381a8 dbu ma, dza 380b5-381a8 (vol.96, p.154)dbu ma, dza
380b5-381a8 dbu ma'i don bsdus pa ma d+h+ya mAr+tha saM gra ha da madhyamakārthasaṁgraha legs ldan 'byed/(bhāvaviveka) tshul khrims rgyal ba dbu ma'i don bsdus pa slob dpon legs ldan 'byed kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
3204 Q5259 1KG13126mdo 'grel, wa1081KG13277mdo 'grel
1b1-333a6 1KG13126mdo 'grel, zha1091KG13278mdo 'grel
1b1-394a5 1KG13126mdo 'grel, za1101KG13279mdo 'grel
1b1-406a8 dbu ma, wa 1a1-za 406a8 (vol.96-97, p.155-?) shes rab sgron ma'i rgya cher 'grel pa pradz+nyA pra dI paM TI kA prajñāpradīpaṭīkā spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs/(avalokitavrata) jānagarbha cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon ba rnam par bzhag pa/ don ngam pa'i de kho na ang dag bar ston pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/ slob dbon bdag nying chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rabs dang thugs rjer ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla ma med ba'i tshul rab tu 'byed ba/ rab tu dga' ba'i sgrabs nas bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ches bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od cas bya bar 'gyur pas mdzad pa de'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma theg pa mchog gi tshul sgrub par byed pa lta ba ngan p'i dri ma sel bar byed pa rjes su dpag pa dang sun dbyung ba'i gsal ba dang de kho na ston pa/ slob dpon btsun pa legs ldan 'byes 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dam pa mchog brnyes pa/ bdag dang gzhan gyi sgrub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu byon pa/ rag sags 'chang grub pa'i gnas khyang par can du gshegs pa/ sku tshe 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i gdan sgrod pa'i thugs ngam can gyis nye bar sbyar ba rgya cher 'grel pa theg pa chen pa dbu ma pa'i slob dpon yul sa ke ta na nas byung ba/ bram za'i rigs shigs shing sla la chen po lta bu rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag chub pa/ rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' thams cad la mkhas pa/ sbyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs kyisnye bar sbyar ba rdzogs so//_ //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dz+nya na gr+b+ha dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/ 'di la rab tu byed pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun/ shu log ni nyi khri bzhi stong yod/ bam po ni brgyad cur byas so
3205 Q5260 1KG13126mdo 'grel, 'a1111KG13280mdo 'grel
1a1-225b7 dbu ma, 'a 1a1-225b7 (vol.98, p.1-92)dbu ma, 'a
1b1-225b7 dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba mu ka mA d+h+ya mi ka br-it+ti pra san+na pa da nA ma mūlamadhyamakavṛttiprasannapadā-nāma zla ba grags pa/(candrakīrti) kanakavarba (kanakavarman) mahāsumata (mahāsumati) pa tshab nyi ma grags bstan bcos dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel ba tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/_mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba/_/ri mor bris pa'i ba drus ma la 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas/_sbyar ba yongs su rdzogs so/_/kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dpung /_rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'dabs su/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po rtog ge pa chen po/_ma hA su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur/_phyis ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka na ka warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang /_gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o
3905 Q5261 1KG13126mdo 'grel, 'a1111KG13280mdo 'grel
225b7-245a2 dbu ma, 'a 225b7-245a2 (vol.98, p.92-100)dbu ma, 'a
225b7-245a2 dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa ma d+h+ya mA ba tA ra kA ri kA nA ma madhyamakāvatārakārikā-nāma zla ba grags pa/(candrakīrti) kṛṣṇapaṇḍita tilakakalaśa nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba/ pa tshab nyi ma grags dbu ma 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_slob dpon zla ba grags pa/_zab pa dang /_rgya che'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/_theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/_mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rabs dang thugs rje mnga' ba/_ri mor bris pa'i ba drus ma las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las/_/slar kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka ka la sha dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur pa ltar cung zad bcos pa/_/don tshang zhing tshig bde bar 'bris pa'o
3206 Q5262 1KG13126mdo 'grel, 'a1111KG13280mdo 'grel
245a2-264b8 dbu ma, 'a 245a2-264b8 (vol.98, p.100-108)dbu ma, 'a
245a2-264b8 dbu ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ma d+h+yA ma kA ba tA ra nA ma madhyamakāvatāra-nāma zla ba grags pa/(candrakīrti) kanakavarma (kanakavarman) tilaka (tilakakalaśa) pa tshab nyi ma grags dbu ma la 'jug pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul bsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/_mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba/_rin mor bris pa'i ba drus las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so/_/kha che'i yul gyi grong khyer dpe med kyi dpung /_rin po sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du/_kha che'i rgyal po dpal 'phags pa lha'i sku ring la/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka dang /bod kyi lo tsa ba ban+de pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun par bsgyur/_phyis ras ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ki warma dang /_lo tsA ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs pa'i dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/_'dir 'grel pa'i mdzad byang dang /_'gyur byang gi steng nas thun mongs pa rnams bkod pa ni/_rtsa ba logs su bsgyur ba dang 'grel pa'i nang gi rtsa ba gnyis sbyar nas zhus dag byas pa'i dbang du bya pa yin no
3207 Q5263 1KG13126mdo 'grel, 'a1111KG13280mdo 'grel
264b8-411b1 dbu ma, 'a 264b8-411b1 (vol.98, p.108-166)dbu ma, 'a
264b8-411b1 dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ma d+h+yA ma kA ba tA ra b+hA Sh+yaM nA ma madhyamakāvatārabhāṣya-nāma zla ba grags pa/(candrakīrti) kanakavarma (kanakavarman) tilakakalaśa pa tshab nyi ma grags dbu ma la 'jug pa bshad pa zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba/_mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rabs dang thugs rje mnga' ba/_ri mor bris pa'i ba drus ma las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba rdzogs so/_/khungs rnams phal cher mdo bzhin bris/_phyin chad skad gnyis byung srid na/_rtsa 'grel sgra don bzhin bsgyur la/_bzu bor byos la dpyad par gyis/_kha che'i yul gyi grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang du/_kha che'i rgyal po dpal 'phags pa lha'i sku ring la/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti la ka ka la sha dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis/_kha che ba'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur/_phyis ras ra mo cher rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs pa'i dpe dang btugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/_gzhung 'di yi tshad ni bam po bcu gnyis su bam po'i drug cha gcig gis dman pa ste/_sho lo ka sum stong lnga brgya lnga bcu yod ce'o
3208 Q5264 1KG13126mdo 'grel, 'a1111KG13280mdo 'grel
411b1-412a8 dbu ma, 'a 411b1-412a8 (vol.98, p.166-168)dbu ma, 'a
411b1-412a8 dbu ma shes rab la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ma d+h+ya ma kA ba tA ra pradz+nyA nA ma madhyamakaprajñāvatāra-nāma zla ba grags pa/(candrakīrti) zla ba grags pa/(candrakīrti) 'gos khu pa lha btsas dbu ma shes rab la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba 'gos khu pa lha btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o
3209 Q5265 1KG13126mdo 'grel, ya1121KG13281mdo 'grel
1a1-33b3 dbu ma, ya 1a1-33b3 (vol.98, p.169-183)dbu ma, ya
1b1-33b3 rigs pa drug cu pa'i 'grel pa yuk+ti ShaSh+TI ka nr-it+ti yuktiṣaṣṭikāvṛtti zla grags/(candrakīrti) dānaśīla jinamitra śīlendrabodhi ye shes sde rigs pa drug cu pa'i 'grel pa 'di ni/_slob dpon zla grags zhes bya ba theg pa chen po dbu ma'i slob dpon yul sa ma ta nas skyes pa/_mu stegs can rtog ge ngan par smra ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi mun pa mang po rnam par 'joms pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dka' mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyis snang bar gyur na/_gnas pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tsha bas gdungs pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag bsil bar mdzad pa'i zla ba'i zer dri ma med pa dpag tu med pas grags pa yin te/_des mdzad pa'i rigs pa drug cu pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

TI kA ta t+war+tha nA ma abhidharmakoṣabhāṣyaṭīkātattvārtha-nāma blo gros brtan pa/(sthiramati) chos skyong bzang po/(dharmapālabhadra) chos mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa'i rgya cher bshad pa don gyi de kho na nyid ces slob dpon blo gros bstan pas mdzad pa 'di/_sngar gangs can du mdzod kyi 'grel bshad slob dpon blo gros bstan pas mdzad pa gnam lcags thogs zer zhes bya ba yod do/_zhes mkhas pa rnams la de tsam grags pa ma gtogs ma 'gyur ba las/_'di'i rgya dpe chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa gzhon nu dpal pa'i phyag tu byung ba/_rje nyid mdzad pa thar phyir pas 'gyur mdzad pa ma grub pa las/_bstan pa rin po che la gcig tu gces spras mdzad cing lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'dren pa dam pa mtshungs med chos kyi rin po che zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas thugs dgongs rnam par dag pas bka' gnang ste/_'di nyid bod skad du bsgyur bar nus sam zhes gsungs pa las/_bar skabs su hor kong cung zad lus pa 'dug na'ang sngar mngon pa mdzod rtsa 'grel dang 'grel bshad rgyal po sras dang gang spel la sogs pa 'gyur 'dug pa 'di dag gi tshig don la lang gtugs/_sngon gyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis chos bsgyur tshul dang sgra'i gzhung lugs phyogs tsam rtogs pas phal cher ba bod skad du bsgyur nus pa 'dra zhes gsol ba la/_de lta na bstan pa'i bya ba yin pas cis kyang bsgyur ba legs/_dpang lo tsA ba lta bu'i 'gyur la'ang hor kong sngags su lus 'dug cing /_da phyis gzhan gyi rdzogs par 'gyur ba yang dga' bas bsgyur cig ces dka' gnang zhing mthun rkyen stsal te/_zhwa lu lo tsA ba d+hArma pA la b+ha zhes bas 'di'i rgya dpe ngo bo dang /_dpe dbang gi rgya dpe stag lung nas gnyis pa'i smad dang gsum pa dang bzhi ba'i stod rnams ma gtogs tshang pa zhig rnyed pa dang rang 'grel gyi rgya dpe dang sngar smod pa'i bod dpe rnams la gtugs shing dpyad de sngon gyi mkhas pa rnams kyi bkas bcad bzhin gzhis ka lhun grub gling dang lhun grub lha rtse nas mgo brtsams te/_shar phyogs ko po'i sa'i cha dga' ldan ma mo'i gtsug lag khang du rdzogs par sgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yo ga sangs rgyas 'phel zhes bya bas bgyis so/_da dung 'di'i bar skabs su lus po'i hor kong rnams las cung zad mchan bus gsal bar byas pa la'ang /_don gyi 'grel ba rtogs dgos yod pa dang 'gyur nor 'khrul mchis pa rnams sgra dang mngon pa'i gzhung lugs mthar phyin pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi bzod cing gcod par gsol lo

vyākaraṇamahāśāstrasarasvatīvyākaraṇavṛttiprakriyācaturā-nāma anubhūtisvarūpācārya ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub de ltar ngag gi dbang phyug ma dbyangs can mas gnas lnga rig pa'i slob dpon chen po a nu b+hU ti swa ru pA tsaR+Ya ste rjes su 'byor ba rang bzhin bzang po la dngos su stsal ba'i brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po dbyangs can byA ka ra Na zhes grags pa'i gzhung /_slob dpon chen po de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa rab tu bya ba gsal ldan zhes pa dang bcas pa 'di yang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi ma 'dris pa'i mdza' bshes chen po 'phags pa phyag na pad+ma nyid gdul bya'i snang ngor gsum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs pa don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/_rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sdes gzhung 'di la lha mthong lo tsA ba'i phyed 'gyur tsam gyi legs po zhig yod tshod du 'dug pa deng sang dpe rgyun dkon zhing phyis su bsgyur ba dang /_yig sna kha shas 'dug kyang gzhung don go dka' ba dang slob dpon a nus mdzad pa'i 'grel pa'i dgongs don dang ma 'brel ba sogs 'ga' re 'dug pas/_khyod kyis paN+Di ta mched kyi gsung rgyun ltar 'di bzhin sgyur cig ces bka'i gnang ba thob par brten/_rnam 'dren dam pa 'di nyid kyi gzhal du med pa'i 'aka' drin las 'phags yul nub phyogs ku ru k+Shetra bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs pa gnas lnga rig pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta ba la b+ha dra dang /_paN+Di ta go kU la nA tha mi shra mched kyi drung du gzhung 'grel pa 'di sogs brda sprod pa'i ring lugs la sbyangs pas cung zad tsam shes pa bka' 'bangs kyi mtha' chung gtsang bstod 'dar gyi nor 'dzin yangs par se'i rigs las skyes pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub bam/_tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer 'bod pa'i rmongs brtul snyoms las pas/_me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nyag sum cu rtsa brgyad bsre ba sna tshogs dbyigs ces shing sbrul hor zla gsum pa'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba dang po'i gza' tshes dge bar 'go btsugs lo de'i hor zla dgu pa'i tshes bco lnga dkar po nam gru'i 'grub sbyor gyi dus dge bar/_sde bzhi'i sgo 'phang cig car du phye ba'i phun tshogs lugs brgya'i 'dun sa chen po pho brang po ta lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
